question: Every employee of your company has a Google account. Your operational team needs to manage a large number of instances on Compute Engine. Each member of this team needs only administrative access to the servers. Your security team wants to ensure that the deployment of credentials is operationally efficient and must be able to determine who accessed a given instance. What should you do?
question_translation: 您公司的每位員工都有一個Google帳號。您的營運團隊需要管理 Compute Engine上的大量執行個體。該團隊的每個成員只需要對伺服器進行管理存取。您的安全團隊希望確保憑證部署的操作高效，並且必須能夠確定誰存取了給定實例。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Generate a new SSH key pair. Give the private key to each member of your team. Configure the public key in the metadata of each instance.
options.B: Ask each member of the team to generate a new SSH key pair and to send you their public key. Use a configuration management tool to deploy those keys on each instance.
options.C: Ask each member of the team to generate a new SSH key pair and to add the public key to their Google account. Grant the ‘compute.osAdminLogin’ role to the Google group corresponding to this team.
options.D: Generate a new SSH key pair. Give the private key to each member of your team. Configure the public key as a project-wide public SSH key in your Cloud Platform project and allow project-wide public SSH keys on each instance.

question: You need to create a custom VPC with a single subnet. The subnet's range must be as large as possible. Which range should you use?
question_translation: 您需要建立具有單一子網路的自訂VPC。子網路的範圍必須盡可能大。您應該使用哪個範圍？

question: You want to select and configure a cost-effective solution for relational data on Google Cloud Platform. You are working with a small set of operational data in one geographic location. You need to support point-in-time recovery. What should you do?
question_translation: 您想要為Google Cloud Platform上的關聯式資料選擇和配置經濟高效的解決方案。您正在處理一個地理位置的一組營運數據。您需要支援時間點恢復。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Select Cloud SQL (MySQL). Verify that the enable binary logging option is selected.
options.B: Select Cloud SQL (MySQL). Select the create failover replicas option.
options.C: Select Cloud Spanner. Set up your instance with 2 nodes.
options.D: Select Cloud Spanner. Set up your instance as multi-regional.

question: You want to configure autohealing for network load balancing for a group of Compute Engine instances that run in multiple zones, using the fewest possible steps. You need to configure re-creation of VMs if they are unresponsive after 3 attempts of 10 seconds each. What should you do?
question_translation: 您希望使用盡可能少的步驟為在多個可用區中執行的一組 Compute Engine 執行個體配置自動修復功能，以實現網路負載平衡。如果虛擬機器在3次嘗試（每次10秒）後沒有回應，則需要設定重新建立虛擬機器。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Create an HTTP load balancer with a backend configuration that references an existing instance group. Set the health check to healthy (HTTP)
options.B: Create an HTTP load balancer with a backend configuration that references an existing instance group. Define a balancing mode and set the maximum RPS to 10.
options.C: Create a managed instance group. Set the Autohealing health check to healthy (HTTP)
options.D: Create a managed instance group. Verify that the autoscaling setting is on.

question: You are using multiple configurations for gcloud. You want to review the configured Kubernetes Engine cluster of an inactive configuration using the fewest possible steps. What should you do?
question_translation: 您正在使用多種 gcloud 配置。您希望使用盡可能少的步驟來檢查已設定的非活動配置的 Kubernetes Engine 叢集。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Use gcloud config configurations describe to review the output.
options.B: Use gcloud config configurations activate and gcloud config list to review the output.
options.C: Use kubectl config get-contexts to review the output.
options.D: Use kubectl config use-context and kubectl config view to review the output.

question: Your company uses Cloud Storage to store application backup files for disaster recovery purposes. You want to follow Google's recommended practices. Which storage option should you use?
question_translation: 您的公司使用 Cloud Storage 儲存應用程式備份檔案以用於災難復原。您希望遵循 Google 推薦的做法。您應該使用哪個儲存選項？

options.A: Multi-Regional Storage
options.B: Regional Storage
options.C: Nearline Storage
options.D: Coldline Storage

question: Several employees at your company have been creating projects with Cloud Platform and paying for it with their personal credit cards, which the company reimburses. The company wants to centralize all these projects under a single, new billing account. What should you do?
question_translation: 貴公司的幾名員工一直在使用 Cloud Platform 建立項目，並使用個人信用卡支付費用，公司會報銷。該公司希望將所有這些項目集中在一個新的計費帳戶下。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Contact [email protected] with your bank account details and request a corporate billing account for your company.
options.B: Create a ticket with Google Support and wait for their call to share your credit card details over the phone.
options.C: In the Google Platform Console, go to the Resource Manager and move all projects to the root Organization.
options.D: In the Google Cloud Platform Console, create a new billing account and set up a payment method.

question: You have an application that looks for its licensing server on the IP 10.0.3.21. You need to deploy the licensing server on Compute Engine. You do not want to change the configuration of the application and want the application to be able to reach the licensing server. What should you do?
question_translation: 您有一個應用程式在 IP 10.0.3.21 上尋找其授權伺服器。您需要在 Compute Engine 上部署授權伺服器。您不想更改應用程式的配置，並希望應用程式能夠存取許可伺服器。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Reserve the IP 10.0.3.21 as a static internal IP address using gcloud and assign it to the licensing server.
options.B: Reserve the IP 10.0.3.21 as a static public IP address using gcloud and assign it to the licensing server.
options.C: Use the IP 10.0.3.21 as a custom ephemeral IP address and assign it to the licensing server.
options.D: Start the licensing server with an automatic ephemeral IP address, and then promote it to a static internal IP address.

question: You are deploying an application to App Engine. You want the number of instances to scale based on request rate. You need at least 3 unoccupied instances at all times. Which scaling type should you use?
question_translation: 您正在將應用程式部署到 App Engine。您希望實例數量根據請求率進行擴展。您始終需要至少 3 個空閒實例。您應該使用哪種縮放類型？

options.A: Manual Scaling with 3 instances.
options.B: Basic Scaling with min_instances set to 3.
options.C: Basic Scaling with max_instances set to 3.
options.D: Automatic Scaling with min_idle_instances set to 3.

question: You have a development project with appropriate IAM roles defined. You are creating a production project and want to have the same IAM roles on the new project, using the fewest possible steps. What should you do?
question_translation: 您有一個定義了適當 IAM 角色的開發專案。您正在建立一個生產項目，並希望使用盡可能少的步驟在新項目上擁有相同的 IAM 角色。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Use gcloud iam roles copy and specify the production project as the destination project.
options.B: Use gcloud iam roles copy and specify your organization as the destination organization.
options.C: In the Google Cloud Platform Console, use the 'create role from role' functionality.
options.D: In the Google Cloud Platform Console, use the 'create role' functionality and select all applicable permissions.

question: You need a dynamic way of provisioning VMs on Compute Engine. The exact specifications will be in a dedicated configuration file. You want to follow Google's recommended practices. Which method should you use?
question_translation: 您需要一種在 Compute Engine 上設定虛擬機器的動態方式。確切的規格將在專用的配置文件中。您希望遵循 Google 推薦的做法。您應該使用哪一種方法？

options.A: Deployment Manager
options.B: Cloud Composer
options.C: Managed Instance Group
options.D: Unmanaged Instance Group

question: You have a Dockerfile that you need to deploy on Kubernetes Engine. What should you do?
question_translation: 您有一個需要在 Kubernetes Engine 上部署的 Dockerfile。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Use kubectl app deploy <dockerfilename>.
options.B: Use gcloud app deploy <dockerfilename>.
options.C: Create a docker image from the Dockerfile and upload it to Container Registry. Create a Deployment YAML file to point to that image. Use kubectl to create the deployment with that file.
options.D: Create a docker image from the Dockerfile and upload it to Cloud Storage. Create a Deployment YAML file to point to that image. Use kubectl to create the deployment with that file.

question: Your development team needs a new Jenkins server for their project. You need to deploy the server using the fewest steps possible. What should you do?
question_translation: 您的開發團隊需要為其專案配備新的 Jenkins 伺服器。您需要使用盡可能少的步驟來部署伺服器。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Download and deploy the Jenkins Java WAR to App Engine Standard.
options.B: Create a new Compute Engine instance and install Jenkins through the command line interface.
options.C: Create a Kubernetes cluster on Compute Engine and create a deployment with the Jenkins Docker image.
options.D: Use GCP Marketplace to launch the Jenkins solution.

question: You need to update a deployment in Deployment Manager without any resource downtime in the deployment. Which command should you use?
question_translation: 您需要在部署管理員中更新部署，且部署中不出現任何資源停機。您應該使用哪個命令？

options.A: gcloud deployment-manager deployments create --config <deployment-config-path>
options.B: gcloud deployment-manager deployments update --config <deployment-config-path>
options.C: gcloud deployment-manager resources create --config <deployment-config-path>
options.D: gcloud deployment-manager resources update --config <deployment-config-path>

question: You need to run an important query in BigQuery but expect it to return a lot of records. You want to find out how much it will cost to run the query. You are using on-demand pricing. What should you do?
question_translation: 您需要在 BigQuery 中執行一個重要查詢，但期望它會傳回大量記錄。您想要了解執行該查詢需要花費多少費用。您正在使用按需定價。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Arrange to switch to Flat-Rate pricing for this query, then move back to on-demand.
options.B: Use the command line to run a dry run query to estimate the number of bytes read. Then convert that bytes estimate to dollars using the Pricing Calculator.
options.C: Use the command line to run a dry run query to estimate the number of bytes returned. Then convert that bytes estimate to dollars using the Pricing Calculator.
options.D: Run a select count (*) to get an idea of how many records your query will look through. Then convert that number of rows to dollars using the Pricing Calculator.

question: You have a single binary application that you want to run on Google Cloud Platform. You decided to automatically scale the application based on underlying infrastructure CPU usage. Your organizational policies require you to use virtual machines directly. You need to ensure that the application scaling is operationally efficient and completed as quickly as possible. What should you do?
question_translation: 您有一個想要在 Google Cloud Platform 上運行的二進位應用程式。您決定根據底層基礎架構 CPU 使用情況自動擴充應用程式。您的組織策略要求您直接使用虛擬機器。您需要確保應用程式擴充操作高效並儘快完成。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Create a Google Kubernetes Engine cluster, and use horizontal pod autoscaling to scale the application.
options.B: Create an instance template, and use the template in a managed instance group with autoscaling configured.
options.C: Create an instance template, and use the template in a managed instance group that scales up and down based on the time of day.
options.D: Use a set of third-party tools to build automation around scaling the application up and down, based on Stackdriver CPU usage monitoring.

question: You are analyzing Google Cloud Platform service costs from three separate projects. You want to use this information to create service cost estimates by service type, daily and monthly, for the next six months using standard query syntax. What should you do?
question_translation: 您正在分析三個不同項目的 Google Cloud Platform 服務成本。您希望使用此資訊使用標準查詢語法按服務類型（每天和每月）建立未來六個月的服務成本估算。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Export your bill to a Cloud Storage bucket, and then import into Cloud Bigtable for analysis.
options.B: Export your bill to a Cloud Storage bucket, and then import into Google Sheets for analysis.
options.C: Export your transactions to a local file, and perform analysis with a desktop tool.
options.D: Export your bill to a BigQuery dataset, and then write time window-based SQL queries for analysis.

question: You need to set up a policy so that videos stored in a specific Cloud Storage Regional bucket are moved to Coldline after 90 days, and then deleted after one year from their creation. How should you set up the policy?
question_translation: 您需要設定一項政策，以便儲存在特定 Cloud Storage Regional 儲存桶中的影片在 90 天後移至 Coldline，然後在建立一年後刪除。您應該如何制定政策？

options.A: Use Cloud Storage Object Lifecycle Management using Age conditions with SetStorageClass and Delete actions. Set the SetStorageClass action to 90 days and the Delete action to 275 days.
options.B: Use Cloud Storage Object Lifecycle Management using Age conditions with SetStorageClass and Delete actions. Set the SetStorageClass action to 90 days and the Delete action to 365 days.
options.C: Use gsutil rewrite and set the Delete action to 275 days (365-90).
options.D: Use gsutil rewrite and set the Delete action to 365 days.

question: You have a Linux VM that must connect to Cloud SQL. You created a service account with the appropriate access rights. You want to make sure that the VM uses this service account instead of the default Compute Engine service account. What should you do?
question_translation: 您有一個必須連接到 Cloud SQL 的 Linux 虛擬機器。您建立了一個具有適當存取權限的服務帳戶。您需要確保虛擬機器使用此服務帳戶而不是預設的 Compute Engine 服務帳戶。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: When creating the VM via the web console, specify the service account under the 'Identity and API Access' section.
options.B: Download a JSON Private Key for the service account. On the Project Metadata, add that JSON as the value for the key compute-engine-service-account.
options.C: Download a JSON Private Key for the service account. On the Custom Metadata of the VM, add that JSON as the value for the key compute-engine-service-account.
options.D: Download a JSON Private Key for the service account. After creating the VM, ssh into the VM and save the JSON under ~/.gcloud/compute-engine-service-account.json.

question: You created an instance of SQL Server 2017 on Compute Engine to test features in the new version. You want to connect to this instance using the fewest number of steps. What should you do?
question_translation: 您在 Compute Engine 上建立了 SQL Server 2017 執行個體以測試新版本中的功能。您希望使用最少的步驟連線到此實例。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Install a RDP client on your desktop. Verify that a firewall rule for port 3389 exists.
options.B: Install a RDP client in your desktop. Set a Windows username and password in the GCP Console. Use the credentials to log in to the instance.
options.C: Set a Windows password in the GCP Console. Verify that a firewall rule for port 22 exists. Click the RDP button in the GCP Console and supply the credentials to log in.
options.D: Set a Windows username and password in the GCP Console. Verify that a firewall rule for port 3389 exists. Click the RDP button in the GCP Console, and supply the credentials to log in.

question: You have one GCP account running in your default region and zone and another account running in a non-default region and zone. You want to start a new Compute Engine instance in these two Google Cloud Platform accounts using the command line interface. What should you do?
question_translation: 您有一個 GCP 帳戶在預設區域和地區運行，另一個帳戶在非預設區域和地區運行。你想開始一個新的 Compute Engine 實例使用命令列介面。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Create two configurations using gcloud config configurations create [NAME]. Run gcloud config configurations activate [NAME] to switch between accounts when running the commands to start the Compute Engine instances.
options.B: Create two configurations using gcloud config configurations create [NAME]. Run gcloud configurations list to start the Compute Engine instances.
options.C: Activate two configurations using gcloud configurations activate [NAME]. Run gcloud config list to start the Compute Engine instances.
options.D: Activate two configurations using gcloud configurations activate [NAME]. Run gcloud configurations list to start the Compute Engine instances.

question: You significantly changed a complex Deployment Manager template and want to confirm that the dependencies of all defined resources are properly met before committing it to the project. You want the most rapid feedback on your changes. What should you do?
question_translation: 您對複雜的 Deployment Manager 範本進行了重大更改，並希望在將其提交到專案之前確認所有已定義資源的依賴關係都已正確滿足。您希望對您的變更獲得最快速的回饋。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Use granular logging statements within a Deployment Manager template authored in Python.
options.B: Monitor activity of the Deployment Manager execution on the Stackdriver Logging page of the GCP Console.
options.C: Execute the Deployment Manager template against a separate project with the same configuration, and monitor for failures.
options.D: Execute the Deployment Manager template using the "--preview" option in the same project, and observe the state of interdependent resources.

question: You are building a pipeline to process time-series data. Which Google Cloud Platform services should you put in boxes 1,2,3, and 4?
question_translation: 您正在建立一個管道來處理時間序列資料。您應該將哪些 Google Cloud Platform 服務放入方塊 1、2、3 和 4 中？

options.A: Cloud Pub/Sub, Cloud Dataflow, Cloud Datastore, BigQuery
options.B: Firebase Messages, Cloud Pub/Sub, Cloud Spanner, BigQuery
options.C: Cloud Pub/Sub, Cloud Storage, BigQuery, Cloud Bigtable
options.D: Cloud Pub/Sub, Cloud Dataflow, Cloud Bigtable, BigQuery

question: You have a project for your App Engine application that serves a development environment. The required testing has succeeded and you want to create a new project to serve as your production environment. What should you do?
question_translation: 您有一個為開發環境提供服務的 App Engine 應用程式專案。所需的測試已成功，您想要建立一個新專案作為您的生產環境。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Use gcloud to create the new project, and then deploy your application to the new project.
options.B: Use gcloud to create the new project and to copy the deployed application to the new project.
options.C: Create a Deployment Manager configuration file that copies the current App Engine deployment into a new project.
options.D: Deploy your application again using gcloud and specify the project parameter with the new project name to create the new project.

question: You need to configure IAM access audit logging in BigQuery for external auditors. You want to follow Google-recommended practices. What should you do?
question_translation: 您需要在 BigQuery 中為外部審核員設定 IAM 存取審核日誌記錄。您需要遵循 Google 推薦的做法。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Add the auditors group to the 'logging.viewer' and 'bigQuery.dataViewer' predefined IAM roles.
options.B: Add the auditors group to two new custom IAM roles.
options.C: Add the auditor user accounts to the 'logging.viewer' and 'bigQuery.dataViewer' predefined IAM roles.
options.D: Add the auditor user accounts to two new custom IAM roles.

question: You need to set up permissions for a set of Compute Engine instances to enable them to write data into a particular Cloud Storage bucket. You want to follow Google-recommended practices. What should you do?
question_translation: 您需要為一組 Compute Engine 執行個體設定權限，以使它們能夠將資料寫入特定的 Cloud Storage 儲存桶。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Create a service account with an access scope. Use the access scope 'https://www.googleapis.com/auth/devstorage.write_only'.
options.B: Create a service account with an access scope. Use the access scope 'https://www.googleapis.com/auth/cloud-platform'.
options.C: Create a service account and add it to the IAM role 'storage.objectCreator' for that bucket.
options.D: Create a service account and add it to the IAM role 'storage.objectAdmin' for that bucket.

question: You have sensitive data stored in three Cloud Storage buckets and have enabled data access logging. You want to verify activities for a particular user for these buckets, using the fewest possible steps. You need to verify the addition of metadata labels and which files have been viewed from those buckets. What should you do?
question_translation: 您將敏感資料儲存在三個 Cloud Storage 儲存桶中，並啟用了資料存取日誌記錄。您希望使用盡可能少的步驟來驗證特定使用者在這些儲存桶中的活動。您需要驗證元資料標籤的新增以及已從這些儲存桶中查看了哪些檔案。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Using the GCP Console, filter the Activity log to view the information.
options.B: Using the GCP Console, filter the Stackdriver log to view the information.
options.C: View the bucket in the Storage section of the GCP Console.
options.D: Create a trace in Stackdriver to view the information.

question: You are the project owner of a GCP project and want to delegate control to colleagues to manage buckets and files in Cloud Storage. You want to follow Google-recommended practices. Which IAM roles should you grant your colleagues?
question_translation: 您是 GCP 專案的專案擁有者，希望將控制權委託給同事來管理 Cloud Storage 中的儲存桶和檔案。您應該向您的同事授予哪些 IAM 角色？

options.A: Project Editor
options.B: Storage Admin
options.C: Storage Object Admin
options.D: Storage Object Creator

question: You have an object in a Cloud Storage bucket that you want to share with an external company. The object contains sensitive data. You want access to the content to be removed after four hours. The external company does not have a Google account to which you can grant specific user-based access privileges. You want to use the most secure method that requires the fewest steps. What should you do?
question_translation: 您的 Cloud Storage 儲存桶中有一個想要與外部公司共用的物件。該對象包含敏感資料。您希望在四小時後刪除對內容的存取。外部公司沒有您可以授予特定的基於使用者的存取權限的 Google 帳戶。您希望使用需要最少步驟的最安全的方法。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Create a signed URL with a four-hour expiration and share the URL with the company.
options.B: Set object access to 'public' and use object lifecycle management to remove the object after four hours.
options.C: Configure the storage bucket as a static website and furnish the object's URL to the company. Delete the object from the storage bucket after four hours.
options.D: Create a new Cloud Storage bucket specifically for the external company to access. Copy the object to that bucket. Delete the bucket after four hours have passed.

question: You are creating a Google Kubernetes Engine (GKE) cluster with a cluster autoscaler feature enabled. You need to make sure that each node of the cluster will run a monitoring pod that sends container metrics to a third-party monitoring solution. What should you do?
question_translation: 您正在建立啟用了叢集自動擴縮器功能的 Google Kubernetes Engine (GKE) 叢集。您需要確保叢集的每個節點都將執行一個監控 Pod，將容器指標傳送到第三方監控解決方案。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Deploy the monitoring pod in a StatefulSet object.
options.B: Deploy the monitoring pod in a DaemonSet object.
options.C: Reference the monitoring pod in a Deployment object.
options.D: Reference the monitoring pod in a cluster initializer at the GKE cluster creation time.

question: You want to send and consume Cloud Pub/Sub messages from your App Engine application. The Cloud Pub/Sub API is currently disabled. You will use a service account to authenticate your application to the API. You want to make sure your application can use Cloud Pub/Sub. What should you do?
question_translation: 您想要從 App Engine 應用程式發送和使用 Cloud Pub/Sub 訊息。Cloud Pub/Sub API 目前已停用。您將使用服務帳戶向 API 驗證您的應用程式。您希望確保您的應用程式可以使用 Cloud Pub/Sub。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Enable the Cloud Pub/Sub API in the API Library on the GCP Console.
options.B: Rely on the automatic enablement of the Cloud Pub/Sub API when the Service Account accesses it.
options.C: Use Deployment Manager to deploy your application. Rely on the automatic enablement of all APIs used by the application being deployed.
options.D: Grant the App Engine Default service account the role of Cloud Pub/Sub Admin. Have your application enable the API on the first connection to Cloud Pub/Sub.

question: You need to monitor resources that are distributed over different projects in Google Cloud Platform. You want to consolidate reporting under the same Stackdriver Monitoring dashboard. What should you do?
question_translation: 您需要監控分佈在 Google Cloud Platform 中不同項目的資源。您想要在同一個 Stackdriver 監控儀表板下合併報告。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Use Shared VPC to connect all projects, and link Stackdriver to one of the projects.
options.B: For each project, create a Stackdriver account. In each project, create a service account for that project and grant it the role of Stackdriver Account Editor in all other projects.
options.C: Configure a single Stackdriver account, and link all projects to the same account.
options.D: Configure a single Stackdriver account for one of the projects. In Stackdriver, create a Group and add the other project names as criteria for that Group.

question: You are deploying an application to a Compute Engine VM in a managed instance group. The application must be running at all times, but only a single instance of the VM should run per GCP project. How should you configure the instance group?
question_translation: 您正在將應用程式部署到託管執行個體群組中的 Compute Engine 虛擬機器。應用程式必須始終運行，但每個 GCP 專案只能運行一個虛擬機器實例。您應該如何配置實例組？

options.A: Set autoscaling to On, set the minimum number of instances to 1, and then set the maximum number of instances to 1.
options.B: Set autoscaling to Off, set the minimum number of instances to 1, and then set the maximum number of instances to 1.
options.C: Set autoscaling to On, set the minimum number of instances to 1, and then set the maximum number of instances to 2.
options.D: Set autoscaling to Off, set the minimum number of instances to 1, and then set the maximum number of instances to 2.

question: You want to verify the IAM users and roles assigned within a GCP project named my-project. What should you do?
question_translation: 您想要驗證在名為 my-project 的 GCP 專案中指派的 IAM 使用者和角色。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Run gcloud iam roles list. Review the output section.
options.B: Run gcloud iam service-accounts list. Review the output section.
options.C: Navigate to the project and then to the IAM section in the GCP Console. Review the members and roles.
options.D: Navigate to the project and then to the Roles section in the GCP Console. Review the roles and status.

question: You need to create a new billing account and then link it with an existing Google Cloud Platform project. What should you do?
question_translation: 您需要建立一個新的結算帳戶，然後將其與現有的 Google Cloud Platform 專案關聯。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Verify that you are Project Billing Manager for the GCP project. Update the existing project to link it to the existing billing account.
options.B: Verify that you are Project Billing Manager for the GCP project. Create a new billing account and link the new billing account to the existing project.
options.C: Verify that you are Billing Administrator for the billing account. Create a new project and link the new project to the existing billing account.
options.D: Verify that you are Billing Administrator for the billing account. Update the existing project to link it to the existing billing account.

question: You have one project called proj-sa where you manage all your service accounts. You want to be able to use a service account from this project to take snapshots of VMs running in another project called proj-vm. What should you do?
question_translation: 您有一個名為 proj-sa 的項目，您可以在其中管理所有服務帳戶。您希望能夠使用此專案中的服務帳戶來拍攝另一個名為 proj-vm 的專案中執行的 VM 的快照。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Download the private key from the service account, and add it to each VM's custom metadata.
options.B: Download the private key from the service account, and add the private key to each VM's SSH keys.
options.C: Grant the service account the IAM Role of Compute Storage Admin in the project called proj-vm.
options.D: When creating the VMs, set the service account's API scope for Compute Engine to read/write.

question: You created a Google Cloud Platform project with an App Engine application inside the project. You initially configured the application to be served from the us-central region. Now you want the application to be served from the asia-northeast1 region. What should you do?
question_translation: 您建立了一個 Google Cloud Platform 項目，其中包含一個 App Engine 應用程式。您最初將應用程式配置為從美國中部區域提供服務。現在您希望從 asia-northeast1 區域提供應用程式。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Change the default region property setting in the existing GCP project to asia-northeast1.
options.B: Change the region property setting in the existing App Engine application from us-central to asia-northeast1.
options.C: Create a second App Engine application in the existing GCP project and specify asia-northeast1 as the region to serve your application.
options.D: Create a new GCP project and create an App Engine application inside this new project. Specify asia-northeast1 as the region to serve your application.

question: You need to grant access for three users so that they can view and edit table data on a Cloud Spanner instance. What should you do?
question_translation: 您需要為三個使用者授予存取權限，以便他們可以查看和編輯 Cloud Spanner 實例上的表資料。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Run gcloud iam roles describe roles/spanner.databaseUser. Add the users to the role.
options.B: Run gcloud iam roles describe roles/spanner.databaseUser. Add the users to a new group. Add the group to the role.
options.C: Run gcloud iam roles describe roles/spanner.viewer --project my-project. Add the users to the role.
options.D: Run gcloud iam roles describe roles/spanner.viewer --project my-project. Add the users to a new group. Add the group to the role.

question: You create a new Google Kubernetes Engine (GKE) cluster and want to make sure that it always runs a supported and stable version of Kubernetes. What should you do?
question_translation: 您建立一個新的 Google Kubernetes Engine (GKE) 集群，並希望確保它始終運行受支援且穩定的 Kubernetes 版本。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Enable the Node Auto-Repair feature for your GKE cluster.
options.B: Enable the Node Auto-Upgrades feature for your GKE cluster.
options.C: Select the latest available cluster version for your GKE cluster.
options.D: Select 'Container-Optimized OS (cos)' as a node image for your GKE cluster.

question: You have an instance group that you want to load balance. You want the load balancer to terminate the client SSL session. The instance group is used to serve a public web application over HTTPS. You want to follow Google-recommended practices. What should you do?
question_translation: 您有一個想要進行負載平衡的實例群組。您希望負載平衡器終止客戶端 SSL 會話。實例組用於透過 HTTPS 為公共 Web 應用程式提供服務。您需要遵循 Google 推薦的做法。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Configure an HTTP(S) load balancer.
options.B: Configure an internal TCP load balancer.
options.C: Configure an external SSL proxy load balancer.
options.D: Configure an external TCP proxy load balancer.

question: You have 32GB of data in a single file that you need to upload to a Nearline Storage bucket. The WAN connection you are using is rated at 1 Gbps, and you are the only one on the connection. You want to use as much of the rated 1 Gbps as possible to transfer the file rapidly. How should you upload the file?
question_translation: 您需要將單一檔案中的 32GB 資料上傳到近線儲存桶。您使用的 WAN 連線的額定速率為 1Gbps，且您是該連線上的唯一使用者。您希望使用盡可能多的額定 1Gbps 來快速傳輸檔案。您應該如何上傳文件？

options.A: Use the GCP Console to transfer the file instead of gsutil.
options.B: Enable parallel composite uploads using gsutil on the file transfer.
options.C: Decrease the TCP window size on the machine initiating the transfer.
options.D: Change the storage class of the bucket from Nearline to Multi-Regional.

question: You've deployed a microservice called myapp1 to a Google Kubernetes Engine cluster using the YAML file specified below. You need to refactor this configuration so that the database password is not stored in plain text. You want to follow Google-recommended practices. What should you do?
question_translation: 您已使用下面指定的 YAML 檔案將名為 myapp1 的微服務部署到 Google Kubernetes Engine 叢集。您需要重構此配置，以便資料庫密碼不以明文形式儲存。您需要遵循 Google 推薦的做法。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Store the database password inside the Docker image of the container, not in the YAML file.
options.B: Store the database password inside a Secret object. Modify the YAML file to populate the DB_PASSWORD environment variable from the Secret.
options.C: Store the database password inside a ConfigMap object. Modify the YAML file to populate the DB_PASSWORD environment variable from the ConfigMap.
options.D: Store the database password in a file inside a Kubernetes persistent volume, and use a persistent volume claim to mount the volume to the container.

question: You are running an application on multiple virtual machines within a managed instance group and have autoscaling enabled. The autoscaling policy is configured so that additional instances are added to the group if the CPU utilization of instances goes above 80%. The virtual machine instances take around three minutes to become available for users. You observe that when the instance group autoscales, it adds more instances than necessary to support the levels of end-user traffic. You want to properly maintain instance group sizes when autoscaling. What should you do?
question_translation: 您正在託管實例組內的多個虛擬機器上執行應用程序，並且啟用了自動擴充。您會發現，當實例組自動縮放時，它會添加比支援最終用戶流量等級所需的更多實例。您希望在自動縮放時正確維護實例組大小。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Set the maximum number of instances to 1.
options.B: Decrease the maximum number of instances to 3.
options.C: Use a TCP health check instead of an HTTP health check.
options.D: Increase the initial delay of the HTTP health check to 200 seconds.

question: You need to select and configure compute resources for a set of batch processing jobs. These jobs take around 2 hours to complete and are run nightly. You want to minimize service costs. What should you do?
question_translation: 您需要為一組批次作業選擇和配置計算資源。這些作業大約需要 2 小時才能完成，並且每晚都會執行。您希望最大限度地降低服務成本。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Select Google Kubernetes Engine. Use a single-node cluster with a small instance type.
options.B: Select Google Kubernetes Engine. Use a three-node cluster with micro instance types.
options.C: Select Compute Engine. Use preemptible VM instances of the appropriate standard machine type.
options.D: Select Compute Engine. Use VM instance types that support micro bursting.

question: You recently deployed a new version of an application to App Engine and then discovered a bug in the release. You need to immediately revert to the prior version of the application. What should you do?
question_translation: 您最近將應用程式的新版本部署到 App Engine，然後發現了該版本中的錯誤。您需要立即恢復到應用程式的先前版本。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Run gcloud app restore.
options.B: On the App Engine page of the GCP Console, select the application that needs to be reverted and click Revert.
options.C: On the App Engine Versions page of the GCP Console, route 100% of the traffic to the previous version.
options.D: Deploy the original version as a separate application. Then go to App Engine settings and split traffic between applications so that the original version serves 100% of the requests.

question: You deployed an App Engine application using gcloud app deploy, but it did not deploy to the intended project. You want to find out why this happened and where the application deployed. What should you do?
question_translation: 您使用 gcloud app deploy 部署了 App Engine 應用程序，但它沒有部署到預期專案。您想要找出發生這種情況的原因以及應用程式的部署位置。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Check the app.yaml file for your application and check project settings.
options.B: Check the web-application.xml file for your application and check project settings.
options.C: Go to Deployment Manager and review settings for deployment of applications.
options.D: Go to Cloud Shell and run gcloud config list to review the Google Cloud configuration used for deployment.

question: You want to configure 10 Compute Engine instances for availability when maintenance occurs. Your requirements state that these instances should attempt to automatically restart if they crash. Also, the instances should be highly available including during system maintenance. What should you do?
question_translation: 您想要設定 10 個 Compute Engine 實例，以便在進行維護時可用。您的要求規定，這些實例在崩潰時應嘗試自動重新啟動。此外，實例應該具有高可用性，包括在系統維護期間。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Create an instance template for the instances. Set the 'Automatic Restart' to on. Set the 'On-host maintenance' to Migrate VM instance. Add the instance template to an instance group.
options.B: Create an instance template for the instances. Set 'Automatic Restart' to off. Set 'On-host maintenance' to Terminate VM instances. Add the instance template to an instance group.
options.C: Create an instance group for the instances. Set the 'Autohealing' health check to healthy (HTTP).
options.D: Create an instance group for the instance. Verify that the 'Advanced creation options' setting for 'do not retry machine creation' is set to off.

question: You host a static website on Cloud Storage. Recently, you began to include links to PDF files on this site. Currently, when users click on the links to these PDF files, their browsers prompt them to save the file onto their local system. Instead, you want the clicked PDF files to be displayed within the browser window directly, without prompting the user to save the file locally. What should you do?
question_translation: 您在 Cloud Storage 上託管一個靜態網站。最近，您開始在此網站上新增 PDF 文件的連結。目前，當使用者點擊這些 PDF 檔案的連結時，瀏覽器會提示他們將檔案儲存到本機系統上。相反，您希望單擊的 PDF 檔案直接顯示在瀏覽器視窗中，而不提示使用者在本機上儲存檔案。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Enable Cloud CDN on the website frontend.
options.B: Enable 'Share publicly' on the PDF file objects.
options.C: Set Content-Type metadata to application/pdf on the PDF file objects.
options.D: Add a label to the storage bucket with a key of Content-Type and value of application/pdf.

question: You have a virtual machine that is currently configured with 2 vCPUs and 4 GB of memory. It is running out of memory. You want to upgrade the virtual machine to have 8 GB of memory. What should you do?
question_translation: 您有一個目前配置 2 個 vCPU 和 4GB 記憶體的虛擬機器。記憶體不足。您想要將虛擬機器升級為具有 8GB 記憶體。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Rely on live migration to move the workload to a machine with more memory.
options.B: Use gcloud to add metadata to the VM. Set the key to required-memory-size and the value to 8 GB.
options.C: Stop the VM, change the machine type to n1-standard-8, and start the VM.
options.D: Stop the VM, increase the memory to 8 GB, and start the VM.

question: You have production and test workloads that you want to deploy on Compute Engine. Production VMs need to be in a different subnet than the test VMs. All the VMs must be able to reach each other over Internal IP without creating additional routes. You need to set up VPC and the 2 subnets. Which configuration meets these requirements?
question_translation: 您有想要在 Compute Engine 上部署的生產和測試工作負載。生產虛擬機器需要位於與測試虛擬機器不同的子網路中。所有虛擬機器必須能夠透過內部 IP 相互訪問，而無需建立額外的路由。您需要設定 VPC 和 2 個子網路。哪種配置滿足這些要求？

options.A: Create a single custom VPC with 2 subnets. Create each subnet in a different region and with a different CIDR range.
options.B: Create a single custom VPC with 2 subnets. Create each subnet in the same region and with the same CIDR range.
options.C: Create 2 custom VPCs, each with a single subnet. Create each subnet in a different region and with a different CIDR range.
options.D: Create 2 custom VPCs, each with a single subnet. Create each subnet in the same region and with the same CIDR range.

question: You need to create an autoscaling managed instance group for an HTTPS web application. You want to make sure that unhealthy VMs are recreated. What should you do?
question_translation: 您需要為 HTTPS Web 應用程式建立自動擴充託管實例組。您希望確保重新建立不健康的虛擬機器。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Create a health check on port 443 and use that when creating the Managed Instance Group.
options.B: Select Multi-Zone instead of Single-Zone when creating the Managed Instance Group.
options.C: In the Instance Template, add the label 'health-check'.
options.D: In the Instance Template, add a startup script that sends a heartbeat to the metadata server.

question: Your company has a Google Cloud Platform project that uses BigQuery for data warehousing. Your data science team changes frequently and has few members. You need to allow members of this team to perform queries. You want to follow Google-recommended practices. What should you do?
question_translation: 您的公司有一個使用 BigQuery 進行資料倉儲的 Google Cloud Platform 專案。您的數據科學團隊經常變動且成員很少。您需要允許該團隊的成員執行查詢。您需要遵循 Google 推薦的做法。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Create an IAM entry for each data scientist's user account. Assign the BigQuery jobUser role to the group.
options.B: Create an IAM entry for each data scientist's user account. Assign the BigQuery dataViewer user role to the group.
options.C: Create a dedicated Google group in Cloud Identity. Add each data scientist's user account to the group. Assign the BigQuery jobUser role to the group.
options.D: Create a dedicated Google group in Cloud Identity. Add each data scientist's user account to the group. Assign the BigQuery dataViewer user role to the group.

question: Your company has a 3-tier solution running on Compute Engine. Each tier has a service account that is associated with all instances within it. You need to enable communication on TCP port 8080 between tiers as follows: * Instances in tier #1 must communicate with tier #2. * Instances in tier #2 must communicate with tier #3. What should you do?
question_translation: 您的公司有一個在 Compute Engine 上運行的 3 層解決方案。目前基礎設施的配置如下所示。每個層都有一個與其中的所有實例關聯的服務帳戶。您需要在層之間啟用 TCP 連接埠 8080 上的通信，如下所示：* 第 1 層中的實例必須與第 2 層通訊。* 第 2 層中的實例必須與第 3 層通訊。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Create an ingress firewall rule for all instances using IP ranges.
options.B: Create an ingress firewall rule using tier-specific service accounts and allowing TCP:8080.
options.C: Create an ingress firewall rule allowing all traffic.
options.D: Create an egress firewall rule allowing TCP:8080.

question: You are given a project with a single Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) and a single subnetwork in the us-central1 region. There is a Compute Engine instance hosting an application in this subnetwork. You need to deploy a new instance in the same project in the europe-west1 region. This new instance needs access to the application. You want to follow Google-recommended practices. What should you do?
question_translation: 您將獲得一個位於 us-central1 區域的具有單一虛擬私有雲 (VPC) 和單一子網路的專案。該子網路中有一個託管應用程式的 Compute Engine 執行個體。您需要在 europe-west1 區域的相同專案中部署一個新執行個體。這個新實例需要存取應用程式。您需要遵循 Google 推薦的做法。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Create a subnetwork in the same VPC in europe-west1. Create the new instance in the new subnetwork and use the first instance's private address as the endpoint.
options.B: Create a VPC and a subnetwork in europe-west1. Expose the application with an internal load balancer.
options.C: Create a subnetwork in the same VPC in europe-west1. Use Cloud VPN to connect the two subnetworks.
options.D: Create a VPC and a subnetwork in europe-west1. Peer the 2 VPCs.

question: Your projects incurred more costs than you expected last month. Your research reveals that a development GKE container emitted a huge number of logs, which resulted in higher costs. You want to disable the logs quickly using the minimum number of steps. What should you do?
question_translation: 您的專案上個月產生的成本比您預期的要多。您的研究表明，開發 GKE 容器會發出大量日誌，從而導致成本更高。您希望使用最少的步驟快速停用日誌。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Go to the Logs ingestion window in Stackdriver Logging and disable the log source for the GKE container resource.
options.B: Go to the Logs ingestion window in Stackdriver Logging and disable the log source for the GKE Cluster Operations resource.
options.C: Go to the GKE console, delete existing clusters, and recreate a new cluster.
options.D: Go to the GKE console, delete existing clusters, and disable legacy Stackdriver Monitoring.

question: You have a website hosted on App Engine standard environment. You want 1% of your users to see a new test version of the website. You want to minimize complexity. What should you do?
question_translation: 您有一個託管在 App Engine 標準環境中的網站。您希望 1% 的用戶看到網站的新測試版本。您希望最大程度地減少複雜性。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Deploy the new version in the same application and use the --migrate option.
options.B: Deploy the new version in the same application and use the --splits option to give a weight of 99 to the current version and a weight of 1 to the new version.
options.C: Create a new App Engine application in the same project. Deploy the new version in that application. Use the App Engine library to proxy 1% of the requests to the new version.
options.D: Create a new App Engine application in the same project. Deploy the new version in that application. Configure your network load balancer to send 1% of the traffic to that new application.

question: You have a web application deployed as a managed instance group. You have a new version of the application to gradually deploy. Your web application is currently receiving live web traffic. You want to ensure that the available capacity does not decrease during the deployment. What should you do?
question_translation: 您有一個 Web 應用程式部署為託管實例組。您有一個新版本的應用程式需要逐步部署。您的網路應用程式目前正在接收即時網路流量。您希望確保部署期間可用容量不會減少。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Perform a rolling-action start-update with maxSurge set to 0 and maxUnavailable set to 1.
options.B: Perform a rolling-action start-update with maxSurge set to 1 and maxUnavailable set to 0.
options.C: Create a new managed instance group with an updated instance template. Add the group to the backend service for the load balancer. When all instances in the new managed instance group are healthy, delete the old managed instance group.
options.D: Create a new instance template with the new application version. Update the existing managed instance group with the new instance template. Delete the instances in the managed instance group to allow the managed instance group to recreate the instance using the new instance template.

question: You are building an application that stores relational data from users. Users across the globe will use this application. Your CTO is concerned about the scaling requirements because the size of the user base is unknown. You need to implement a database solution that can scale with your user growth with minimum configuration changes. Which storage solution should you use?
question_translation: 您正在建立一個儲存用戶關係資料的應用程式。全球各地的用戶都將使用此應用程式。您的 CTO 擔心擴展要求，因為用戶群的規模未知。您需要實施一個資料庫解決方案，該解決方案可以透過最少的配置變更來隨著使用者的成長而擴展。您應該使用哪種儲存解決方案？

options.A: Cloud SQL
options.B: Cloud Spanner
options.C: Cloud Firestore
options.D: Cloud Datastore

question: You are the organization and billing administrator for your company. The engineering team has the Project Creator role on the organization. You do not want the engineering team to be able to link projects to the billing account. Only the finance team should be able to link a project to a billing account, but they should not be able to make any other changes to projects. What should you do?
question_translation: 您是您公司的組織和計費管理員。工程團隊在組織中具有專案創建者角色。您不希望工程團隊能夠將專案連結到計費帳戶。只有財務團隊應該能夠將項目連結到計費帳戶，但他們不應該能夠對項目進行任何其他更改。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Assign the finance team only the Billing Account User role on the billing account.
options.B: Assign the engineering team only the Billing Account User role on the billing account.
options.C: Assign the finance team the Billing Account User role on the billing account and the Project Billing Manager role on the organization.
options.D: Assign the engineering team the Billing Account User role on the billing account and the Project Billing Manager role on the organization.

question: You have an application running in Google Kubernetes Engine (GKE) with cluster autoscaling enabled. The application exposes a TCP endpoint. There are several replicas of this application. You have a Compute Engine instance in the same region, but in another Virtual Private Cloud (VPC), called gce-network, that has no overlapping IP ranges with the first VPC. This instance needs to connect to the application on GKE. You want to minimize effort. What should you do?
question_translation: 您有一個在 Google Kubernetes Engine (GKE) 中運行且啟用了叢集自動擴展的應用程式。應用程式公開一個 TCP 端點。該應用程式有多個副本。您在同一區域中有一個 Compute Engine 實例，但位於另一個名為 gce-network 的 Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) 中，該實例與第一個 VPC 沒有重疊的 IP 範圍。該實例需要連接到 GKE 上的應用程式。您想盡量減少工作量。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Create a LoadBalancer service and set externalTrafficPolicy to Cluster.
options.B: Create a NodePort service and use a proxy instance with iptables forwarding.
options.C: Create a LoadBalancer service with an annotation for internal routing and peer the two VPCs together.
options.D: Create a LoadBalancer service with Cloud Armor Security Policy.

question: Your organization is a financial company that needs to store audit log files for 3 years. Your organization has hundreds of Google Cloud projects. You need to implement a cost-effective approach for log file retention. What should you do?
question_translation: 您的組織是一家金融公司，需要將審核日誌檔案儲存 3 年。您的組織擁有數百個 Google Cloud 專案。您需要實施一種經濟有效的方法來保留日誌檔案。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Create an export to the sink that saves logs from Cloud Audit to BigQuery.
options.B: Create an export to the sink that saves logs from Cloud Audit to a Coldline Storage bucket.
options.C: Write a custom script that uses logging API to copy the logs from Stackdriver logs to BigQuery.
options.D: Export these logs to Cloud Pub/Sub and write a Cloud Dataflow pipeline to store logs to Cloud SQL.

question: You want to run a single caching HTTP reverse proxy on GCP for a latency-sensitive website. This specific reverse proxy consumes almost no CPU. You want to have a 30-GB in-memory cache, and need an additional 2 GB of memory for the rest of the processes. You want to minimize cost. How should you run this reverse proxy?
question_translation: 您希望在 GCP 上為延遲敏感的網站執行單一快取 HTTP 反向代理。這種特定的反向代理幾乎不消耗 CPU。您希望擁有 30GB 記憶體緩存，並需要額外 2GB 記憶體用於其餘進程。您想最大限度地降低成本。您應該如何運行這個反向代理？

options.A: Create a Cloud Memorystore for Redis instance with 32-GB capacity.
options.B: Run it on Compute Engine, and choose a custom instance type with 6 vCPUs and 32GB of memory.
options.C: Package it in a container image, and run it on Kubernetes Engine, using n1-standard-32 instances as nodes.
options.D: Run it on Compute Engine, choose the instance type n1-standard-1, and add an SSD persistent disk of 32 GB.

question: You are hosting an application on bare-metal servers in your own data center. The application needs access to Cloud Storage. However, security policies prevent the servers hosting the application from having public IP addresses or access to the internet. You want to follow Google-recommended practices to provide the application with access to Cloud Storage. What should you do?
question_translation: 您在自己的資料中心的裸機伺服器上託管應用程式。應用程式需要存取雲端儲存。但是，安全性原則會阻止託管應用程式的伺服器擁有公用 IP 位址或存取網際網路。您需要遵循 Google 推薦的做法來為應用程式提供對 Cloud Storage 的存取權。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Use nslookup to get the IP address for storage.googleapis.com. Negotiate with the security team to give a public IP address to the servers.
options.B: Using Cloud VPN, create a VPN tunnel to a Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) in Google Cloud. Create a Compute Engine instance and install the Squid proxy server.
options.C: Use Migrate for Compute Engine to migrate those servers. Create an internal load balancer (ILB) that uses storage.googleapis.com as backend.
options.D: Using Cloud VPN or Interconnect, create a tunnel to a VPC in Google Cloud. Use Cloud Router to create a custom route advertisement.

question: You want to deploy an application on Cloud Run that processes messages from a Cloud Pub/Sub topic. You want to follow Google-recommended practices. What should you do?
question_translation: 您想要在 Cloud Run 上部署一個應用程式來處理來自 Cloud Pub/Sub 主題的訊息。您需要遵循 Google 推薦的做法。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Create a Cloud Function that uses a Cloud Pub/Sub trigger.
options.B: Grant the Pub/Sub Subscriber role to the service account used by Cloud Run.
options.C: Create a service account and assign the Cloud Run Invoker role.
options.D: Deploy your application on Cloud Run on GKE with internal connectivity.

question: You need to deploy an application, which is packaged in a container image, in a new project. The application exposes an HTTP endpoint and receives very few requests per day. You want to minimize costs. What should you do?
question_translation: 您需要在新專案中部署一個打包在容器映像中的應用程式。該應用程式公開一個 HTTP 端點，每天收到的請求很少。您希望最大限度地降低成本。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Deploy the container on Cloud Run.
options.B: Deploy the container on Cloud Run on GKE.
options.C: Deploy the container on App Engine Flexible.
options.D: Deploy the container on GKE with cluster autoscaling and horizontal pod autoscaling enabled.

question: Your company has an existing GCP organization with hundreds of projects and a billing account. Your company recently acquired another company that also has hundreds of projects and its own billing account. You would like to consolidate all GCP costs of both GCP organizations onto a single invoice. You would like to consolidate all costs as of tomorrow. What should you do?
question_translation: 您的公司現有一個包含數百個項目和一個結算帳戶的 GCP 組織。您的公司最近收購了另一家公司，該公司也擁有數百個項目和自己的計費帳戶。您希望將兩個 GCP 組織的所有 GCP 成本合併到一張發票上。您希望從明天開始合併所有費用。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Link the acquired company's projects to your company's billing account.
options.B: Configure the acquired company's billing account and your company's billing account to export the billing data into the same BigQuery dataset.
options.C: Migrate the acquired company's projects into your company's GCP organization. Link the migrated projects to your company's billing account.
options.D: Create a new GCP organization and a new billing account. Migrate the acquired company's projects and your company's projects into the new GCP organization and link the projects to the new billing account.

question: You built an application on Google Cloud that uses Cloud Spanner. Your support team needs to monitor the environment but should not have access to table data. You need a streamlined solution to grant the correct permissions to your support team, and you want to follow Google-recommended practices. What should you do?
question_translation: 您在 Google Cloud 上建立了一個使用 Cloud Spanner 的應用程式。您的支援團隊需要監控環境，但不應存取表格資料。您需要一個簡化的解決方案來向您的支援團隊授予正確的權限，並且您希望遵循 Google 建議的做法。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Add the support team group to the roles/monitoring.viewer role.
options.B: Add the support team group to the roles/spanner.databaseUser role.
options.C: Add the support team group to the roles/spanner.databaseReader role.
options.D: Add the support team group to the roles/stackdriver.accounts.viewer role.

question: For analysis purposes, you need to send all the logs from all of your Compute Engine instances to a BigQuery dataset called platform-logs. You have already installed the Cloud Logging agent on all the instances. You want to minimize cost. What should you do?
question_translation: 出於分析目的，您需要將所有 Compute Engine 實例的所有日誌傳送到名為 platform-logs 的 BigQuery 資料集。您已在所有實例上安裝 Cloud Logging 代理程式。您想最大限度地降低成本。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Give the BigQuery Data Editor role on the platform-logs dataset to the service accounts used by your instances.
options.B: Create a logs export with a Cloud Pub/Sub topic called logs as a sink.
options.C: Create a filter in Cloud Logging to view only Compute Engine logs and export them to BigQuery.
options.D: Create a Cloud Function that has the BigQuery User role and triggers a query for log analysis.

question: You are using Deployment Manager to create a Google Kubernetes Engine cluster. Using the same Deployment Manager deployment, you also want to create a DaemonSet in the kube-system namespace of the cluster. You want a solution that uses the fewest possible services. What should you do?
question_translation: 您正在使用 Deployment Manager 建立 Google Kubernetes Engine 叢集。使用相同的 Deployment Manager 部署，您也想建立一個 DaemonSet 位於叢集的 kube-system 命名空間。您需要一個盡可能使用更少的服務的解決方案。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Add the cluster's API as a new Type Provider in Deployment Manager, and use the new type to create the DaemonSet.
options.B: Use the Deployment Manager Runtime Configurator to create a new Config resource that contains the DaemonSet definition.
options.C: Create a Compute Engine instance with a startup script that uses kubectl to create the DaemonSet.
options.D: In the cluster's definition in Deployment Manager, add metadata with kube-system as key and the DaemonSet manifest as value.

question: You are building an application that will run in your data center. The application will use Google Cloud Platform (GCP) services like AutoML. You created a service account that has appropriate access to AutoML. You need to enable authentication to the APIs from your on-premises environment. What should you do?
question_translation: 您正在建立一個將在您的資料中心運行的應用程式。該應用程式將使用 AutoML 等 Google Cloud Platform (GCP) 服務。您建立了一個對 AutoML 具有適當存取權限的服務帳戶。您需要從本機環境啟用對 API 的身份驗證。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Use service account credentials in your on-premises application.
options.B: Use gcloud to create a key file for the service account that has appropriate permissions.
options.C: Set up direct interconnect between your data center and Google Cloud Platform to enable authentication.
options.D: Grant a user account permissions similar to the service account permissions, and use this user account for authentication.

question: You are using Container Registry to centrally store your company's container images in a separate project. In another project, you want to create a Google Kubernetes Engine (GKE) cluster. You want to ensure that Kubernetes can download images from Container Registry. What should you do?
question_translation: 您正在使用 Container Registry 將公司的容器映像集中儲存在單獨的專案中。在另一個專案中，您想要建立一個 Google Kubernetes Engine (GKE) 叢集。您希望確保 Kubernetes 可以從 Container Registry 下載鏡像。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: In the project where the images are stored, grant the Storage Object Viewer IAM role to the service account used by the Kubernetes nodes.
options.B: When you create the GKE cluster, choose the Allow full access to all Cloud APIs option under 'Access scopes'.
options.C: Create a service account, and give it access to Cloud Storage. Create a P12 key for this service account and use it as an imagePullSecrets in Kubernetes.
options.D: Configure the ACLs on each image in Cloud Storage to give read-only access to the default Compute Engine service account.

question: You deployed a new application inside your Google Kubernetes Engine cluster using the YAML file specified below. You check the status of the deployed pods and notice that one of them is still in PENDING status. You want to find out why the pod is stuck in pending status. What should you do?
question_translation: 您使用下面指定的 YAML 檔案在 Google Kubernetes Engine 叢集內部署了一個新應用程式。您檢查已部署 Pod 的狀態，發現其中一個仍處於 PENDING 狀態。您想要找出 Pod 陷入掛起狀態的原因。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Review details of the myapp-service Service object and check for error messages.
options.B: Review details of the myapp-deployment Deployment object and check for error messages.
options.C: Review details of myapp-deployment-58ddbbb995-lp86m Pod and check for warning messages.
options.D: View logs of the container in myapp-deployment-58ddbbb995-lp86m pod and check for warning messages.

question: You are setting up a Windows VM on Compute Engine and want to make sure you can log in to the VM via RDP. What should you do?
question_translation: 您正在 Compute Engine 上設定 Windows 虛擬機，並希望確保可以透過 RDP 登入該虛擬機。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: After the VM has been created, use your Google Account credentials to log into the VM.
options.B: After the VM has been created, use gcloud compute reset-windows-password to retrieve the login credentials for the VM.
options.C: When creating the VM, add metadata to the instance using 'windows-password' as the key and a password as the value.
options.D: After the VM has been created, download the JSON private key for the default Compute Engine service account. Use the credentials in the JSON file to log into the VM.

question: You want to configure an SSH connection to a single Compute Engine instance for users in the dev1 group. This instance is the only resource in this particular Google Cloud Platform project that the dev1 users should be able to connect to. What should you do?
question_translation: 您想要為 dev1 群組中的使用者配置與單一 Compute Engine 實例的 SSH 連線。該實例是該特定專案中的唯一資源，dev1 使用者應該能夠連接到。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Set metadata to enable-oslogin=true for the instance. Grant the dev1 group the compute.osLogin role. Direct them to use the Cloud Shell to ssh to that instance.
options.B: Set metadata to enable-oslogin=true for the instance. Set the service account to no service account for that instance.
options.C: Enable block project-wide keys for the instance. Generate an SSH key for each user in the dev1 group. Distribute the keys to dev1 users and direct them to use their third-party tools to connect.
options.D: Enable block project-wide keys for the instance. Generate an SSH key and associate the key with that instance. Distribute the key to dev1 users and direct them to use their third-party tools to connect.

question: You need to produce a list of the enabled Google Cloud Platform APIs for a GCP project using the gcloud command line in the Cloud Shell. The project name is my-project. What should you do?
question_translation: 您需要使用 Cloud Shell 中的 gcloud 命令行為 GCP 專案產生已啟用的 Google Cloud Platform API 清單。專案名稱是 my-project。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Run gcloud projects list to get the project ID, and then run gcloud services list --project <project ID>.
options.B: Run gcloud init to set the current project to my-project, and then run gcloud services list --available.
options.C: Run gcloud info to view the account value, and then run gcloud services list --account <Account>.
options.D: Run gcloud projects describe <project ID> to verify the project value, and then run gcloud services list --available.

question: You are building a new version of an application hosted in an App Engine environment. You want to test the new version with 1% of users before you completely switch your application over to the new version. What should you do?
question_translation: 您正在建立在 App Engine 環境中託管的應用程式的新版本。在將應用程式完全切換到新版本之前，您希望與 1% 的用戶一起測試新版本。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Deploy a new version of your application in Google Kubernetes Engine instead of App Engine and then use GCP Console to split traffic.
options.B: Deploy a new version of your application in a Compute Engine instance instead of App Engine and then use GCP Console to split traffic.
options.C: Deploy a new version as a separate app in App Engine. Then configure App Engine using GCP Console to split traffic between the two apps.
options.D: Deploy a new version of your application in App Engine. Then go to App Engine settings in GCP Console and split traffic between the current version and newly deployed versions accordingly.

question: You need to provide a cost estimate for a Kubernetes cluster using the GCP pricing calculator for Kubernetes. Your workload requires high IOPs, and you will also be using disk snapshots. You start by entering the number of nodes, average hours, and average days. What should you do next?
question_translation: 您需要使用 Kubernetes 的 GCP 定價計算器提供 Kubernetes 叢集的成本估算。您的工作負載需要高 IOP，並且您還將使用磁碟快照。首先輸入節點數、平均小時數和平均天數。接下來你該做什麼？

options.A: Fill in local SSD. Fill in persistent disk storage and snapshot storage.
options.B: Fill in local SSD. Add estimated cost for cluster management.
options.C: Select Add GPUs. Fill in persistent disk storage and snapshot storage.
options.D: Select Add GPUs. Add estimated cost for cluster management.

question: You are using Google Kubernetes Engine with autoscaling enabled to host a new application. You want to expose this new application to the public, using HTTPS on a public IP address. What should you do?
question_translation: 您正在使用啟用了自動縮放功能的 Google Kubernetes Engine 來託管新應用程式。您希望在公共 IP 位址上使用 HTTPS 向公眾公開這個新應用程式。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Create a Kubernetes Service of type NodePort for your application, and a Kubernetes Ingress to expose this Service via a Cloud Load Balancer.
options.B: Create a Kubernetes Service of type ClusterIP for your application. Configure the public DNS name of your application using the IP of this Service.
options.C: Create a Kubernetes Service of type NodePort to expose the application on port 443 of each node of the Kubernetes cluster. Configure the public DNS name of your application with the IP of every node of the cluster to achieve load-balancing.
options.D: Create a HAProxy pod in the cluster to load-balance the traffic to all the pods of the application. Forward the public traffic to HAProxy with an iptable rule. Configure the DNS name of your application using the public IP of the node HAProxy is running on.

question: You need to enable traffic between multiple groups of Compute Engine instances that are currently running two different GCP projects. Each group of Compute Engine instances is running in its own VPC. What should you do?
question_translation: 您需要啟用目前執行兩個不同 GCP 專案的多組 Compute Engine 執行個體之間的流量。每組計算引擎實例在其自己的 VPC 中運行。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Verify that both projects are in a GCP Organization. Create a new VPC and add all instances.
options.B: Verify that both projects are in a GCP Organization. Share the VPC from one project and request that the Compute Engine instances in the other project use this shared VPC.
options.C: Verify that you are the Project Administrator of both projects. Create two new VPCs and add all instances.
options.D: Verify that you are the Project Administrator of both projects. Create a new VPC and add all instances.

question: You want to add a new auditor to a Google Cloud Platform project. The auditor should be allowed to read, but not modify, all project items. How should you configure the auditor's permissions?
question_translation: 您想要在 Google Cloud Platform 專案中新增審核員。應允許審核員閱讀但不得修改所有項目項目。您應該如何設定審核員的權限？

options.A: Create a custom role with view-only project permissions. Add the user's account to the custom role.
options.B: Create a custom role with view-only service permissions. Add the user's account to the custom role.
options.C: Select the built-in IAM project Viewer role. Add the user's account to this role.
options.D: Select the built-in IAM service Viewer role. Add the user's account to this role.

question: You are operating a Google Kubernetes Engine (GKE) cluster for your company where different teams can run non-production workloads. Your Machine Learning (ML) team needs access to Nvidia Tesla P100 GPUs to train their models. You want to minimize effort and cost. What should you do?
question_translation: 您正在為您的公司運營一個 Google Kubernetes Engine (GKE) 叢集，不同的團隊可以在其中運行非生產工作負載。您的機器學習 (ML) 團隊需要使用 Nvidia Tesla P100 GPU 來訓練他們的模型。您希望最大限度地減少工作量和成本。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Ask your ML team to add the 'accelerator: gpu' annotation to their pod specification.
options.B: Recreate all the nodes of the GKE cluster to enable GPUs on all of them.
options.C: Create your own Kubernetes cluster on top of Compute Engine with nodes that have GPUs. Dedicate this cluster to your ML team.
options.D: Add a new GPU-enabled node pool to the GKE cluster. Ask your ML team to add the cloud.google.com/gke-accelerator: nvidia-tesla-p100 nodeSelector to their pod specification.

question: Your VMs are running in a subnet that has a subnet mask of 255.255.255.240. The current subnet has no more free IP addresses, and you require an additional 10 IP addresses for new VMs. The existing and new VMs should all be able to reach each other without additional routes. What should you do?
question_translation: 您的虛擬機器在子網路遮罩為 255.255.255.240 的子網路中運作。目前子網路沒有更多可用 IP 位址，您需要額外的 10 個 IP 位址來部署新的虛擬機。所有虛擬機器應該能夠相互訪問，而無需建立額外的路由。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Use gcloud to expand the IP range of the current subnet.
options.B: Delete the subnet, and recreate it using a wider range of IP addresses.
options.C: Create a new project. Use Shared VPC to share the current network with the new project.
options.D: Create a new subnet with the same starting IP but a wider range to overwrite the current subnet.

question: Your organization uses G Suite for communication and collaboration. All users in your organization have a G Suite account. You want to grant some G Suite users access to your Cloud Platform project. What should you do?
question_translation: 您的組織使用 G Suite 進行溝通和協作。您組織中的所有使用者都有 G Suite 帳號。您想要授予某些 G Suite 使用者存取您的 Cloud Platform 專案的權限。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Enable Cloud Identity in the GCP Console for your domain.
options.B: Grant them the required IAM roles using their G Suite email address.
options.C: Create a CSV sheet with all users' email addresses. Use the gcloud command-line tool to convert them into Google Cloud Platform accounts.
options.D: In the G Suite console, add the users to a special group called [email protected]. Rely on the default behavior of the Cloud Platform to grant users access if they are members of this group.

question: You have a Google Cloud Platform account with access to both production and development projects. You need to create an automated process to list all compute instances in development and production projects on a daily basis. What should you do?
question_translation: 您擁有一個可以存取生產和開發專案的 Google Cloud Platform 帳戶。您需要建立一個自動化流程來每天列出開發和生產專案中的所有計算實例。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Create two configurations using gcloud config. Write a script that sets configurations as active, individually. For each configuration, use gcloud compute instances list to get a list of compute resources.
options.B: Create two configurations using gsutil config. Write a script that sets configurations as active, individually. For each configuration, use gsutil compute instances list to get a list of compute resources.
options.C: Go to Cloud Shell and export this information to Cloud Storage on a daily basis.
options.D: Go to GCP Console and export this information to Cloud SQL on a daily basis.

question: You have a large 5-TB AVRO file stored in a Cloud Storage bucket. Your analysts are proficient only in SQL and need access to the data stored in this file. You want to find a cost-effective way to complete their request as soon as possible. What should you do?
question_translation: 您在 Cloud Storage 儲存桶中儲存了一個 5TB 的大型 AVRO 檔案。您的分析師僅精通 SQL，並且需要存取此文件中儲存的資料。您希望找到一種經濟高效的方式來盡快完成他們的請求。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Load data in Cloud Datastore and run a SQL query against it.
options.B: Create a BigQuery table and load data in BigQuery. Run a SQL query on this table and drop this table after you complete your request.
options.C: Create external tables in BigQuery that point to Cloud Storage buckets and run a SQL query on these external tables to complete your request.
options.D: Create a Hadoop cluster and copy the AVRO file to HDFS by compressing it. Load the file in a Hive table and provide access to your analysts so that they can run SQL queries.

question: You need to verify that a Google Cloud Platform service account was created at a particular time. What should you do?
question_translation: 您需要驗證 Google Cloud Platform 服務帳戶是否是在特定時間建立的。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Filter the Activity log to view the Configuration category. Filter the Resource type to Service Account.
options.B: Filter the Activity log to view the Configuration category. Filter the Resource type to Google Project.
options.C: Filter the Activity log to view the Data Access category. Filter the Resource type to Service Account.
options.D: Filter the Activity log to view the Data Access category. Filter the Resource type to Google Project.

question: You deployed an LDAP server on Compute Engine that is reachable via TLS through port 636 using UDP. You want to make sure it is reachable by clients over that port. What should you do?
question_translation: 您在 Compute Engine 上部署了一個 LDAP 伺服器，可使用 UDP 透過連接埠 636 透過 TLS 存取該伺服器。您需要確保客戶端可以透過該連接埠存取它。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Add the network tag allow-udp-636 to the VM instance running the LDAP server.
options.B: Create a route called allow-udp-636 and set the next hop to be the VM instance running the LDAP server.
options.C: Add a network tag of your choice to the instance. Create a firewall rule to allow ingress on UDP port 636 for that network tag.
options.D: Add a network tag of your choice to the instance running the LDAP server. Create a firewall rule to allow egress on UDP port 636 for that network tag.

question: You need to set a budget alert for use of Compute Engineer services on one of the three Google Cloud Platform projects that you manage. All three projects are linked to a single billing account. What should you do?
question_translation: 您需要在您管理的三個 Google Cloud Platform 專案之一上設定使用運算工程師服務的預算提醒。所有三個項目都連結到一個計費帳戶。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Verify that you are the project billing administrator. Select the associated billing account and create a budget and alert for the appropriate project.
options.B: Verify that you are the project billing administrator. Select the associated billing account and create a budget and a custom alert.
options.C: Verify that you are the project administrator. Select the associated billing account and create a budget for the appropriate project.
options.D: Verify that you are the project administrator. Select the associated billing account and create a budget and a custom alert.

question: You are migrating a production-critical on-premises application that requires 96 vCPUs to perform its task. You want to make sure the application runs in a similar environment on GCP. What should you do?
question_translation: 您正在遷移一個生產關鍵型本機應用程序，該應用程式需要 96 個 vCPU 才能執行其任務。您希望確保應用程式在 GCP 上的類似環境中運作。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: When creating the VM, use machine type n1-standard-96.
options.B: When creating the VM, use Intel Skylake as the CPU platform.
options.C: Create the VM using Compute Engine default settings. Use gcloud to modify the running instance to have 96 vCPUs.
options.D: Start the VM using Compute Engine default settings, and adjust as you go based on Rightsizing Recommendations.

question: You want to configure a solution for archiving data in a Cloud Storage bucket. The solution must be cost-effective. Data with multiple versions should be archived after 30 days. Previous versions are accessed once a month for reporting. This archive data is also occasionally updated at month-end. What should you do?
question_translation: 您想要設定一個解決方案以將資料歸檔到 Cloud Storage 儲存桶中。該解決方案必須具有成本效益。多版本資料應在 30 天後歸檔。每月訪問一次以前的版本以進行報告。該檔案資料偶爾也會在月底更新。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Add a bucket lifecycle rule that archives data with newer versions after 30 days to Coldline Storage.
options.B: Add a bucket lifecycle rule that archives data with newer versions after 30 days to Nearline Storage.
options.C: Add a bucket lifecycle rule that archives data from regional storage after 30 days to Coldline Storage.
options.D: Add a bucket lifecycle rule that archives data from regional storage after 30 days to Nearline Storage.

question: Your company's infrastructure is on-premises, but all machines are running at maximum capacity. You want to burst to Google Cloud. The workloads on Google Cloud must be able to directly communicate to the workloads on-premises using a private IP range. What should you do?
question_translation: 您公司的基礎設施位於本地，但所有電腦都以最大容量運作。您想要爆發到 Google Cloud。Google 上的工作負載雲端必須能夠使用私有 IP 範圍直接與本地工作負載進行通訊。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: In Google Cloud, configure the VPC as a host for Shared VPC.
options.B: In Google Cloud, configure the VPC for VPC Network Peering.
options.C: Create bastion hosts both in your on-premises environment and on Google Cloud. Configure both as proxy servers using their public IP addresses.
options.D: Set up Cloud VPN between the infrastructure on-premises and Google Cloud.

question: You want to select and configure a solution for storing and archiving data on Google Cloud Platform. You need to support compliance objectives for data from one geographic location. This data is archived after 30 days and needs to be accessed annually. What should you do?
question_translation: 您想要選擇並設定用於在 Google Cloud Platform 上儲存和歸檔資料的解決方案。您需要支援來自一個地理位置的資料的合規性目標。該數據將在 30 天後存檔，並且需要每年訪問一次。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Select Multi-Regional Storage. Add a bucket lifecycle rule that archives data after 30 days to Coldline Storage.
options.B: Select Multi-Regional Storage. Add a bucket lifecycle rule that archives data after 30 days to Nearline Storage.
options.C: Select Regional Storage. Add a bucket lifecycle rule that archives data after 30 days to Nearline Storage.
options.D: Select Regional Storage. Add a bucket lifecycle rule that archives data after 30 days to Coldline Storage.

question: Your company uses BigQuery for data warehousing. Over time, many different business units in your company have created 1000+ datasets across hundreds of projects. Your CIO wants you to examine all datasets to find tables that contain an employee_ssn column. You want to minimize effort in performing this task. What should you do?
question_translation: 您的公司使用 BigQuery 進行資料倉儲。隨著時間的推移，您公司的許多不同業務部門已經在數百個專案中創建了 1000 多個資料集。您的 CIO 希望您檢查所有資料集以查找包含 employee_ssn 列的表。您希望最大限度地減少執行此任務的工作量。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Go to Data Catalog and search for employee_ssn in the search box.
options.B: Write a shell script that uses the bq command line tool to loop through all the projects in your organization.
options.C: Write a script that loops through all the projects in your organization and runs a query on INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS view to find the employee_ssn column.
options.D: Write a Cloud Dataflow job that loops through all the projects in your organization and runs a query on INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS view to find employee_ssn column.

question: You create a Deployment with 2 replicas in a Google Kubernetes Engine cluster that has a single preemptible node pool. After a few minutes, you use kubectl to examine the status of your Pod and observe that one of them is still in Pending status. What is the most likely cause?
question_translation: 您在具有單一可搶佔節點池的 Google Kubernetes Engine 叢集中建立具有 2 個副本的 Deployment。幾分鐘後，您使用 kubectl 檢查 Pod 的狀態，發現其中一個 Pod 仍處於 Pending 狀態。最可能的原因是什麼？

options.A: The pending Pod's resource requests are too large to fit on a single node of the cluster.
options.B: Too many Pods are already running in the cluster, and there are not enough resources left to schedule the pending Pod.
options.C: The node pool is configured with a service account that does not have permission to pull the container image used by the pending Pod.
options.D: The pending Pod was originally scheduled on a node that has been preempted between the creation of the Deployment and your verification of the Pods' status. It is currently being rescheduled on a new node.

question: You want to find out when users were added to Cloud Spanner Identity Access Management (IAM) roles on your Google Cloud Platform (GCP) project. What should you do in the GCP Console?
question_translation: 您想要了解使用者何時被加入到 Google Cloud Platform (GCP) 專案上的 Cloud Spanner Identity Access Management (IAM) 角色。您應該在 GCP Console 中做什麼？

options.A: Open the Cloud Spanner console to review configurations.
options.B: Open the IAM & admin console to review IAM policies for Cloud Spanner roles.
options.C: Go to the Stackdriver Monitoring console and review information for Cloud Spanner.
options.D: Go to the Stackdriver Logging console, review admin activity logs, and filter them for Cloud Spanner IAM roles.

question: Your company implemented BigQuery as an enterprise data warehouse. Users from multiple business units run queries on this data warehouse. However, you notice that query costs for BigQuery are very high, and you need to control costs. Which two methods should you use? (Choose two.)
question_translation: 您的公司將 BigQuery 實施為企業資料倉儲。來自多個業務部門的使用者在此資料倉儲上執行查詢。但是，您注意到 BigQuery 的查詢成本非常高，您需要控制成本。您應該使用哪兩種方法？（選兩個。）

options.A: Split the users from business units to multiple projects.
options.B: Apply a user- or project-level custom query quota for BigQuery data warehouse.
options.C: Create separate copies of your BigQuery data warehouse for each business unit.
options.D: Split your BigQuery data warehouse into multiple data warehouses for each business unit.
options.E: Change your BigQuery query model from on-demand to flat rate. Apply the appropriate number of slots to each Project.

question: You are building a product on top of Google Kubernetes Engine (GKE). You have a single GKE cluster. For each of your customers, a Pod is running in that cluster, and your customers can run arbitrary code inside their Pod. You want to maximize the isolation between your customers' Pods. What should you do?
