question_translation: 您正在 Google Kubernetes Engine (GKE) 之上建立產品。您有一個 GKE 叢集。對於您的每個客戶，一個 Pod 都在該叢集中運行，並且您的客戶可以在其 Pod 內運行任意程式碼。您希望最大限度地提高客戶 Pod 之間的隔離。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Use Binary Authorization and whitelist only the container images used by your customers' Pods.
options.B: Use the Container Analysis API to detect vulnerabilities in the containers used by your customers' Pods.
options.C: Create a GKE node pool with a sandbox type configured to gVisor. Add the parameter runtimeClassName: gvisor to the specification of your customers' Pods.
options.D: Use the cos_containerd image for your GKE nodes. Add a nodeSelector with the value cloud.google.com/gke-os-distribution: cos_containerd to the specification of your customers' Pods.

question: Your customer has implemented a solution that uses Cloud Spanner and notices some read latency-related performance issues on one table. This table is accessed only by their users using a primary key. The table schema is shown below. You want to resolve the issue. What should you do?
question_translation: 您的客戶實作了使用 Cloud Spanner 的解決方案，並注意到一張表上存在一些與讀取延遲相關的效能問題。該表只能由其使用者使用主鍵存取。你想解決這個問題。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Remove the profile_picture field from the table.
options.B: Add a secondary index on the person_id column.
options.C: Change the primary key to not have monotonically increasing values.
options.D: Create a secondary index using the following Data Definition Language (DDL).

question: Your finance team wants to view the billing report for your projects. You want to make sure that the finance team does not get additional permissions to the project. What should you do?
question_translation: 您的財務團隊想要查看您專案的帳單報告。您希望確保財務團隊不會獲得專案的額外權限。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Add the group for the finance team to roles/billing user role.
options.B: Add the group for the finance team to roles/billing admin role.
options.C: Add the group for the finance team to roles/billing viewer role.
options.D: Add the group for the finance team to roles/billing project/Manager role.

question: Your organization has strict requirements to control access to Google Cloud projects. You need to enable your Site Reliability Engineers (SREs) to approve requests from the Google Cloud support team when an SRE opens a support case. You want to follow Google-recommended practices. What should you do?
question_translation: 您的組織對控制對 Google Cloud 專案的存取有嚴格的要求。您需要讓網站可靠性工程師 (SRE) 在 SRE 提出支援案例時批准 Google Cloud 支援團隊的請求。您需要遵循 Google 推薦的做法。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Add your SREs to roles/iam.roleAdmin role.
options.B: Add your SREs to roles/accessapproval.approver role.
options.C: Add your SREs to a group and then add this group to roles/iam.roleAdmin.role.
options.D: Add your SREs to a group and then add this group to roles/accessapproval.approver role.

question: You need to host an application on a Compute Engine instance in a project shared with other teams. You want to prevent the other teams from accidentally causing downtime on that application. Which feature should you use?
question_translation: 您需要在與其他團隊共用的專案中的 Compute Engine 執行個體上託管應用程式。您希望防止其他團隊意外導致該應用程式停機。您應該使用哪個功能？

options.A: Use a Shielded VM.
options.B: Use a Preemptible VM.
options.C: Use a sole-tenant node.
options.D: Enable deletion protection on the instance.

question: Your organization needs to grant users access to query datasets in BigQuery but prevent them from accidentally deleting the datasets. You want a solution that follows Google-recommended practices. What should you do?
question_translation: 您的組織需要授予使用者存取 BigQuery 中的查詢資料集的權限，但防止他們意外刪除資料集。您需要一個遵循 Google 推薦做法的解決方案。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Add users to roles/bigquery user role only, instead of roles/bigquery dataOwner.
options.B: Add users to roles/bigquery dataEditor role only, instead of roles/bigquery dataOwner.
options.C: Create a custom role by removing delete permissions, and add users to that role only.
options.D: Create a custom role by removing delete permissions. Add users to the group, and then add the group to the custom role.

question: You have a developer laptop with the Cloud SDK installed on Ubuntu. The Cloud SDK was installed from the Google Cloud Ubuntu package repository. You want to test your application locally on your laptop with Cloud Datastore. What should you do?
question_translation: 您有一台在 Ubuntu 上安裝了 Cloud SDK 的開發人員筆記型電腦。Cloud SDK 是從 Google Cloud Ubuntu 軟體包儲存庫安裝的。您希望使用 Cloud Datastore 在筆記型電腦上本地測試您的應用程式。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Export Cloud Datastore data using gcloud datastore export.
options.B: Create a Cloud Datastore index using gcloud datastore indexes create.
options.C: Install the google-cloud-sdk-datastore-emulator component using the apt-get install command.
options.D: Install the cloud-datastore-emulator component using the gcloud components install command.

question: Your company set up a complex organizational structure on Google Cloud. The structure includes hundreds of folders and projects. Only a few team members should be able to view the hierarchical structure. You need to assign minimum permissions to these team members, and you want to follow Google-recommended practices. What should you do?
question_translation: 貴公司在 Google Cloud 上建立了複雜的組織架構。該結構包括數百個資料夾和項目。只有少數團隊成員應該能夠查看層次結構。您需要為這些團隊成員指派最低權限，並且希望遵循 Google 建議的做法。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Add the users to roles/browser role.
options.B: Add the users to roles/iam.roleViewer role.
options.C: Add the users to a group, and add this group to roles/browser.
options.D: Add the users to a group, and add this group to roles/iam.roleViewer role.

question: Your company has a single sign-on (SSO) identity provider that supports Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) integration with service providers. Your company has users in Cloud Identity. You would like users to authenticate using your company's SSO provider. What should you do?
question_translation: 您的公司有一個單一登入 (SSO) 身分提供者，支援與服務提供者的安全斷言標記語言 (SAML) 整合。您的公司在 Cloud Identity 中擁有使用者。您希望使用者使用您公司的 SSO 提供者進行身份驗證。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: In Cloud Identity, set up SSO with Google as an identity provider to access custom SAML apps.
options.B: In Cloud Identity, set up SSO with a third-party identity provider with Google as a service provider.
options.C: Obtain OAuth 2.0 credentials, configure the user consent screen, and set up OAuth 2.0 for Mobile & Desktop Apps.
options.D: Obtain OAuth 2.0 credentials, configure the user consent screen, and set up OAuth 2.0 for Web Server Applications.

question: Your organization has a dedicated person who creates and manages all service accounts for Google Cloud projects. You need to assign this person the minimum role for projects. What should you do?
question_translation: 您的組織有專人為 Google Cloud 專案建立和管理所有服務帳號。您需要為此人指派專案的最低角色。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Add the user to roles/iam.roleAdmin role.
options.B: Add the user to roles/iam.securityAdmin role.
options.C: Add the user to roles/iam.serviceAccountUser role.
options.D: Add the user to roles/iam.serviceAccountAdmin role.

question: You are building an archival solution for your data warehouse and have selected Cloud Storage to archive your data. Your users need to be able to access this archived data once a quarter for some regulatory requirements. You want to select a cost-efficient option. Which storage option should you use?
question_translation: 您正在為資料倉儲建立歸檔解決方案，並選擇 Cloud Storage 來歸檔您的資料。您的用戶需要能夠每季存取此存檔數據，以滿足某些監管要求。您想要選擇一個經濟高效的選項。您應該使用哪個儲存選項？

options.A: Cold Storage
options.B: Nearline Storage
options.C: Regional Storage
options.D: Multi-Regional Storage

question: A team of data scientists infrequently needs to use a Google Kubernetes Engine (GKE) cluster that you manage. They require GPUs for some long-running, non-restartable jobs. You want to minimize cost. What should you do?
question_translation: 資料科學家團隊很少需要使用您管理的 Google Kubernetes Engine (GKE) 叢集。它們需要 GPU 來執行一些長時間運行、無法重新啟動的作業。您想最大限度地降低成本。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Enable node auto-provisioning on the GKE cluster.
options.B: Create a VerticalPodAutoscaler for those workloads.
options.C: Create a node pool with preemptible VMs and GPUs attached to those VMs.
options.D: Create a node pool of instances with GPUs, and enable autoscaling on this node pool with a minimum size of 1.

question: Your organization has user identities in Active Directory. Your organization wants to use Active Directory as their source of truth for identities. Your organization wants to have full control over the Google accounts used by employees for all Google services, including your Google Cloud Platform (GCP) organization. What should you do?
question_translation: 您的組織在 Active Directory 中擁有使用者身分。您的組織希望使用 Active Directory 作為身分的真實來源。您的組織希望完全控制員工使用所有 Google 服務的 Google 帳號，包括您的 Google Cloud Platform (GCP) 組織。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Use Google Cloud Directory Sync (GCDS) to synchronize users into Cloud Identity.
options.B: Use the Cloud Identity APIs and write a script to synchronize users to Cloud Identity.
options.C: Export users from Active Directory as a CSV and import them to Cloud Identity via the Admin Console.
options.D: Ask each employee to create a Google account using self-signup. Require that each employee use their company email address and password.

question: You have successfully created a development environment in a project for an application. This application uses Compute Engine and Cloud SQL. Now you need to create a production environment for this application. The security team has forbidden the existence of network routes between these 2 environments and has asked you to follow Google-recommended practices. What should you do?
question_translation: 您已成功在專案中為應用程式建立了開發環境。此應用程式使用 Compute Engine 和 Cloud SQL。現在您需要為此應用程式建立生產環境。安全團隊已禁止這兩個環境之間存在網路路由，並要求您遵循 Google 建議的做法。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Create a new project, enable the Compute Engine and Cloud SQL APIs in that project, and replicate the setup you have created in the development environment.
options.B: Create a new production subnet in the existing VPC and a new production Cloud SQL instance in your existing project, and deploy your application using those resources.
options.C: Create a new project, modify your existing VPC to be a Shared VPC, share that VPC with your new project, and replicate the setup you have in the development environment in that new project in the Shared VPC.
options.D: Ask the security team to grant you the Project Editor role in an existing production project used by another division of your company. Once they grant you that role, replicate the setup you have in the development environment in that project.

question: Your management has asked an external auditor to review all the resources in a specific project. The security team has enabled the Organization Policy called Domain Restricted Sharing on the organization node by specifying only your Cloud Identity domain. You want the auditor to only be able to view, but not modify, the resources in that project. What should you do?
question_translation: 您的管理層已要求外部審計員審查特定項目中的所有資源。安全性團隊已啟用名為 Domain Restricted Sharing 的組織策略，透過僅指定您的 Cloud Identity 域，在組織節點上限制共用域。您希望審核員只能查看但不能修改該專案中的資源。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Ask the auditor for their Google account, and give them the Viewer role on the project.
options.B: Ask the auditor for their Google account, and give them the Security Reviewer role on the project.
options.C: Create a temporary account for the auditor in Cloud Identity, and give that account the Viewer role on the project.
options.D: Create a temporary account for the auditor in Cloud Identity, and give that account the Security Reviewer role on the project.

question: You have a workload running on Compute Engine that is critical to your business. You want to ensure that the data on the boot disk of this workload is backed up regularly. You need to be able to restore a backup as quickly as possible in case of disaster. You also want older backups to be cleaned automatically to save on cost. You want to follow Google-recommended practices. What should you do?
question_translation: 您的 Compute Engine 上運行的工作負載對您的業務至關重要。您需要確保定期備份該工作負載啟動磁碟上的資料。您需要能夠在災難發生時盡快恢復備份。您還希望自動清理舊備份以節省成本。您需要遵循 Google 推薦的做法。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Create a Cloud Function to create an instance template.
options.B: Create a snapshot schedule for the disk using the desired interval.
options.C: Create a cron job to create a new disk from the disk using gcloud.
options.D: Create a Cloud Task to create an image and export it to Cloud Storage.

question: You need to assign a Cloud Identity and Access Management (Cloud IAM) role to an external auditor. The auditor needs to have permissions to review your Google Cloud Platform (GCP) Audit Logs and also to review your Data Access logs. What should you do?
question_translation: 您需要將 Cloud Identity and Access Management (Cloud IAM) 角色指派給外部審核員。審核員需要擁有審核您的權限，Google Cloud Platform (GCP) 審核日誌，也可查看您的資料存取日誌。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Assign the auditor the IAM role roles/logging.privateLogViewer. Perform the export of logs to Cloud Storage.
options.B: Assign the auditor the IAM role roles/logging.privateLogViewer. Direct the auditor to also review the logs for changes to Cloud IAM policy.
options.C: Assign the auditor's IAM user to a custom role that has logging.privateLogEntries.list permission. Perform the export of logs to Cloud Storage.
options.D: Assign the auditor's IAM user to a custom role that has logging.privateLogEntries.list permission. Direct the auditor to also review the logs for changes to Cloud IAM policy.

question: You are managing several Google Cloud Platform (GCP) projects and need access to all logs for the past 60 days. You want to be able to explore and quickly analyze the log contents. You want to follow Google-recommended practices to obtain the combined logs for all projects. What should you do?
question_translation: 您正在管理多個 Google Cloud Platform (GCP) 項目，並且需要存取過去 60 天內的所有日誌。您希望能夠探索並快速分析日誌內容。您希望遵循 Google 推薦的做法來取得所有項目的組合日誌。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Navigate to Stackdriver Logging and select resource.labels.project_id='*'
options.B: Create a Stackdriver Logging Export with a Sink destination to a BigQuery dataset. Configure the table expiration to 60 days.
options.C: Create a Stackdriver Logging Export with a Sink destination to Cloud Storage. Create a lifecycle rule to delete objects after 60 days.
options.D: Configure a Cloud Scheduler job to read from Stackdriver and store the logs in BigQuery. Configure the table expiration to 60 days.

question: You need to reduce GCP service costs for a division of your company using the fewest possible steps. You need to turn off all configured services in an existing GCP project. What should you do?
question_translation: 您需要使用盡可能少的步驟來降低公司部門的 GCP 服務成本。您需要關閉現有配置中的所有服務 GCP 專案。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Verify that you are assigned the Project Owners IAM role for this project. Locate the project in the GCP console, click Shut down and then enter the project ID.
options.B: Verify that you are assigned the Project Owners IAM role for this project. Switch to the project in the GCP console, locate the resources and delete them.
options.C: Verify that you are assigned the Organizational Administrator IAM role for this project. Locate the project in the GCP console, enter the project ID and then click Shut down.
options.D: Verify that you are assigned the Organizational Administrators IAM role for this project. Switch to the project in the GCP console, locate the resources and delete them.

question: You are configuring service accounts for an application that spans multiple projects. Virtual machines (VMs) running in the web-applications project need access to BigQuery datasets in crm-databases-proj. You want to follow Google-recommended practices to give access to the service account in the web-applications project. What should you do?
question_translation: 您正在為跨多個項目的應用程式配置服務帳戶。Web 應用程式專案中執行的虛擬機器 (VM) 需要存取 crm-databases-proj 中的 BigQuery 資料集。您需要遵循 Google 建議的做法來授予對 Web 應用程式專案中的服務帳戶的存取權。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Give 'project owner' for web-applications appropriate roles to crm-databases-proj.
options.B: Give 'project owner' role to crm-databases-proj and the web-applications project.
options.C: Give 'project owner' role to crm-databases-proj and bigquery.dataViewer role to web-applications.
options.D: Give bigquery.dataViewer role to crm-databases-proj and appropriate roles to web-applications.

question: An employee was terminated, but their access to Google Cloud was not removed until 2 weeks later. You need to find out if this employee accessed any sensitive customer information after their termination. What should you do?
question_translation: 一名員工被解僱，但他們對 Google Cloud 的存取權限直到兩週後才被刪除。您需要查明該員工在解僱後是否曾造訪任何敏感的客戶資訊。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: View System Event Logs in Cloud Logging. Search for the user's email as the principal.
options.B: View System Event Logs in Cloud Logging. Search for the service account associated with the user.
options.C: View Data Access audit logs in Cloud Logging. Search for the user's email as the principal.
options.D: View the Admin Activity log in Cloud Logging. Search for the service account associated with the user.

question: You need to create a custom IAM role for use with a GCP service. All permissions in the role must be suitable for production use. You also want to clearly share with your organization the status of the custom role. This will be the first version of the custom role. What should you do?
question_translation: 您需要建立自訂 IAM 角色以與 GCP 服務一起使用。角色中的所有權限必須適合生產使用。您還希望與您的組織清楚地共享自訂角色的狀態。這將是自訂角色的第一個版本。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Use permissions in your role that use the 'supported' support level for role permissions. Set the role stage to ALPHA while testing the role permissions.
options.B: Use permissions in your role that use the 'supported' support level for role permissions. Set the role stage to BETA while testing the role permissions.
options.C: Use permissions in your role that use the 'testing' support level for role permissions. Set the role stage to ALPHA while testing the role permissions.
options.D: Use permissions in your role that use the 'testing' support level for role permissions. Set the role stage to BETA while testing the role permissions.

question: Your company has a large quantity of unstructured data in different file formats. You want to perform ETL transformations on the data. You need to make the data accessible on Google Cloud so it can be processed by a Dataflow job. What should you do?
question_translation: 您的公司擁有大量不同文件格式的非結構化資料。您想要對資料執行 ETL 轉換。您需要在 Google Cloud 上存取數據，以便資料流作業可以對其進行處理。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Upload the data to BigQuery using the bq command line tool.
options.B: Upload the data to Cloud Storage using the gsutil command line tool.
options.C: Upload the data into Cloud SQL using the import function in the console.
options.D: Upload the data into Cloud Spanner using the import function in the console.

question: You need to manage multiple Google Cloud projects in the fewest steps possible. You want to configure the Google Cloud SDK command-line interface (CLI) so that you can easily manage multiple projects. What should you do?
question_translation: 您需要以盡可能少的步驟管理多個 Google Cloud 專案。您想要設定 Google Cloud SDK 命令列介面 (CLI)，以便可以輕鬆管理多個專案。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Create a configuration for each project you need to manage. Activate the appropriate configuration when you work with each of your assigned Google Cloud projects.
options.B: Create a configuration for each project you need to manage. Use gcloud init to update the configuration values when you need to work with a non-default project.
options.C: Use the default configuration for one project you need to manage. Activate the appropriate configuration when you work with each of your assigned Google Cloud projects.
options.D: Use the default configuration for one project you need to manage. Use gcloud init to update the configuration values when you need to work with a non-default project.

question: Your managed instance group raised an alert stating that new instance creation has failed to create new instances. You need to maintain the number of running instances specified by the template to be able to process expected application traffic. What should you do?
question_translation: 您的託管實例群組發出警報，指出新執行個體建立未能建立新實例。您需要維護模板指定的正在運行的實例數量，以便能夠處理預期的應用程式流量。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Create an instance template that contains valid syntax which will be used by the instance group. Delete any persistent disks with the same name as instance names.
options.B: Create an instance template that contains valid syntax that will be used by the instance group. Verify that the instance name and persistent disk name values are not the same in the template.
options.C: Verify that the instance template being used by the instance group contains valid syntax. Delete any persistent disks with the same name as instance names. Set the disks.autoDelete property to true in the instance template.
options.D: Delete the current instance template and replace it with a new instance template. Verify that the instance name and persistent disk name values are not the same in the template. Set the disks.autoDelete property to true in the instance template.

question: Your company is moving from an on-premises environment to Google Cloud. You have multiple development teams that use Cassandra environments as backend databases. They all need a development environment that is isolated from other Cassandra instances. You want to move to Google Cloud quickly and with minimal support effort. What should you do?
question_translation: 您的公司正在從本機環境遷移到 Google Cloud。您有多個使用 Cassandra 環境作為後端資料庫的開發團隊。它們都需要一個與其他 Cassandra 實例隔離的開發環境。您希望以最少的支援工作快速遷移到 Google Cloud。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Build an instruction guide to install Cassandra on Google Cloud. Make the instruction guide accessible to your developers.
options.B: Advise your developers to go to Cloud Marketplace. Ask the developers to launch a Cassandra image for their development work.
options.C: Build a Cassandra Compute Engine instance and take a snapshot of it. Use the snapshot to create instances for your developers.
options.D: Build a Cassandra Compute Engine instance and take a snapshot of it. Upload the snapshot to Cloud Storage and make it accessible to your developers. Build instructions to create a Compute Engine instance from the snapshot so that developers can do it themselves.

question: You have a Compute Engine instance hosting a production application. You want to receive an email if the instance consumes more than 90% of its CPU resources for more than 15 minutes. You want to use Google services. What should you do?
question_translation: 您有一個託管生產應用程式的 Compute Engine 執行個體。如果執行個體消耗超過 90% 的 CPU 資源並持續超過 15 分鐘，您希望收到一封電子郵件。您想使用 Google 服務。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Create a consumer Gmail account. Write a script that monitors the CPU usage. When the CPU usage exceeds the threshold, have that script send an email using the Gmail account and smtp.gmail.com on port 25 as SMTP server.
options.B: Create a Cloud Monitoring Workspace and associate your Google Cloud Platform (GCP) project with it. Create a Cloud Monitoring Alerting Policy that uses the threshold as a trigger condition. Configure your email address in the notification channel.
options.C: Create a Cloud Monitoring Workspace and associate your GCP project with it. Write a script that monitors the CPU usage and sends it as a custom metric to Cloud Monitoring. Create an uptime check for the instance in Cloud Monitoring.
options.D: In Cloud Logging, create a logs-based metric to extract the CPU usage by using this regular expression: CPU Usage: ([0-9]{1,3})% In Cloud Monitoring, create an Alerting Policy based on this metric. Configure your email address in the notification channel.

question: You have an application that uses Cloud Spanner as a backend database. The application has a very predictable traffic pattern. You want to automatically scale up or down the number of Spanner nodes depending on traffic. What should you do?
question_translation: 您有一個使用 Cloud Spanner 作為後端資料庫的應用程式。該應用程式具有非常可預測的流量模式。您希望根據流量自動增加或減少 Spanner 節點的數量。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Create a cron job that runs on a scheduled basis to review Cloud Monitoring metrics, and then resize the Spanner instance accordingly.
options.B: Create a Cloud Monitoring alerting policy to send an alert to on-call SRE emails when Cloud Spanner CPU exceeds the threshold. SREs would scale resources up or down accordingly.
options.C: Create a Cloud Monitoring alerting policy to send an alert to Google Cloud Support email when Cloud Spanner CPU exceeds your threshold. Google support would scale resources up or down accordingly.
options.D: Create a Cloud Monitoring alerting policy to send an alert to a webhook when Cloud Spanner CPU is over or under your threshold. Create a Cloud Function that listens to HTTP and resizes Spanner resources accordingly.

question: Your company publishes large files on an Apache web server that runs on a Compute Engine instance. The Apache web server is not the only application running in the project. You want to receive an email when the egress network costs for the server exceed $100 for the current month as measured by Google Cloud. What should you do?
question_translation: 您的公司在 Compute Engine 實例上執行的 Apache Web 伺服器上發布大型檔案。Apache Web 伺服器並不是該專案中執行的唯一應用程式。當 Google Cloud 測量的當月伺服器出口網路成本超過 $100 時，您希望收到一封電子郵件。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Set up a budget alert on the project with an amount of $100, a threshold of 100%, and notification type of 'email'.
options.B: Set up a budget alert on the billing account with an amount of $100, a threshold of 100%, and notification type of 'email'.
options.C: Export the billing data to BigQuery. Create a Cloud Function that uses BigQuery to sum the egress network costs of the exported billing data for the Apache web server for the current month and sends an email if it is over $100. Schedule the Cloud Function using Cloud Scheduler to run hourly.
options.D: Use the Cloud Logging Agent to export the Apache web server logs to Cloud Logging. Create a Cloud Function that uses BigQuery to parse the HTTP response log data in Cloud Logging for the current month and sends an email if the size of all HTTP responses, multiplied by current Google Cloud egress prices, totals over $100. Schedule the Cloud Function using Cloud Scheduler to run hourly.

question: You have designed a solution on Google Cloud that uses multiple Google Cloud products. Your company has asked you to estimate the costs of the solution. You need to provide estimates for the monthly total cost. What should you do?
question_translation: 您在 Google Cloud 上設計了一個使用多種 Google Cloud 產品的解決方案。您的公司要求您估算該解決方案的成本。您需要提供每月總費用的估算。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: For each Google Cloud product in the solution, review the pricing details on the products pricing page. Use the pricing calculator to total the monthly costs for each Google Cloud product.
options.B: For each Google Cloud product in the solution, review the pricing details on the products pricing page. Create a Google Sheet that summarizes the expected monthly costs for each product.
options.C: Provision the solution on Google Cloud. Leave the solution provisioned for 1 week. Navigate to the Billing Report page in the Cloud Console. Multiply the 1-week cost to determine the monthly costs.
options.D: Provision the solution on Google Cloud. Leave the solution provisioned for 1 week. Use Cloud Monitoring to determine the provisioned and used resource amounts. Multiply the 1-week cost to determine the monthly costs.

question: You have an application that receives SSL-encrypted TCP traffic on port 443. Clients for this application are located all over the world. You want to minimize latency for the clients. Which load balancing option should you use?
question_translation: 您有一個在連接埠 443 上接收 SSL 加密的 TCP 流量的應用程式。您希望最大限度地減少客戶端的延遲。您應該使用哪個負載平衡選項？

options.A: HTTPS Load Balancer
options.B: Network Load Balancer
options.C: SSL Proxy Load Balancer
options.D: Internal TCP/UDP Load Balancer. Add a firewall rule allowing ingress traffic from 0.0.0.0/0 on the target instances.

question: You have an application on a general-purpose Compute Engine instance that is experiencing excessive disk read throttling on its Zonal SSD Persistent Disk. The application primarily reads large files from disk. The disk size is currently 350 GB. You want to provide the maximum amount of throughput while minimizing costs. What should you do?
question_translation: 您的通用 Compute Engine 實例上有一個應用程序，在其區域 SSD 永久磁碟上遇到過多的磁碟讀取限制。該應用程式主要從磁碟讀取大檔案。目前磁碟大小為 350GB。您希望提供最大的吞吐量，同時最小化成本。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Increase the size of the disk to 1 TB.
options.B: Increase the allocated CPU to the instance.
options.C: Migrate to use a Local SSD on the instance.
options.D: Migrate to use a Regional SSD on the instance.

question: Your Dataproc cluster runs in a single Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) network in a single subnet with range 172.16.20.128/25. There are no private IP addresses available in the VPC network. You want to add new VMs to communicate with your cluster using the minimum number of steps. What should you do?
question_translation: 您的 Dataproc 叢集在範圍為 172.16.20.128/25 的單一子網路中的單一 Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) 網路中運作。VPC 網路中沒有可用的私有 IP 位址。您希望使用最少的步驟新增新的虛擬機器來與叢集進行通訊。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Modify the existing subnet range to 172.16.20.0/24.
options.B: Create a new Secondary IP Range in the VPC and configure the VMs to use that range.
options.C: Create a new VPC network for the VMs. Enable VPC Peering between the VMs' VPC network and the Dataproc cluster VPC network.
options.D: Create a new VPC network for the VMs with a subnet of 172.32.0.0/16. Enable VPC network Peering between the Dataproc VPC network and the VMs' VPC network. Configure a custom Route exchange.

question: You manage an App Engine Service that aggregates and visualizes data from BigQuery. The application is deployed with the default App Engine Service account. The data that needs to be visualized resides in a different project managed by another team. You do not have access to this project, but you want your application to be able to read data from the BigQuery dataset. What should you do?
question_translation: 您管理一個 App Engine 服務，該服務聚合並視覺化來自 BigQuery 的資料。該應用程式使用預設的 App Engine 服務帳戶進行部署。需要可視化的資料駐留在由另一個團隊管理的不同專案中。您無權存取此項目，但您希望應用程式能夠從 BigQuery 資料集中讀取資料。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Ask the other team to grant your default App Engine Service account the role of BigQuery Job User.
options.B: Ask the other team to grant your default App Engine Service account the role of BigQuery Data Viewer.
options.C: In Cloud IAM of your project, ensure that the default App Engine service account has the role of BigQuery Data Viewer.
options.D: In Cloud IAM of your project, grant a newly created service account from the other team the role of BigQuery Job User in your project.

question: You need to create a copy of a custom Compute Engine virtual machine (VM) to facilitate an expected increase in application traffic due to a business acquisition. What should you do?
question_translation: 您需要建立自訂 Compute Engine 虛擬機器 (VM) 的副本，以促進因業務收購而導致的應用程式流量的預期成長。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Create a Compute Engine snapshot of your base VM. Create your images from that snapshot.
options.B: Create a Compute Engine snapshot of your base VM. Create your instances from that snapshot.
options.C: Create a custom Compute Engine image from a snapshot. Create your images from that image.
options.D: Create a custom Compute Engine image from a snapshot. Create your instances from that image.

question: You have deployed an application on a single Compute Engine instance. The application writes logs to disk. Users start reporting errors with the application. You want to diagnose the problem. What should you do?
question_translation: 您已在單一 Compute Engine 執行個體上部署應用程式。應用程式將日誌寫入磁碟。用戶開始報告應用程式的錯誤。您想要診斷問題。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Navigate to Cloud Logging and view the application logs.
options.B: Connect to the instance's serial console and read the application logs.
options.C: Configure a Health Check on the instance and set a Low Healthy Threshold value.
options.D: Install and configure the Cloud Logging Agent and view the logs from Cloud Logging.

question: An application generates daily reports in a Compute Engine virtual machine (VM). The VM is in the project corp-iot-insights. Your team operates only in the project corp-aggregate-reports and needs a copy of the daily exports in the bucket corp-aggregate-reports-storage. You want to configure access so that the daily reports from the VM are available in the bucket corp-aggregate-reports-storage and use as few steps as possible while following Google-recommended practices. What should you do?
question_translation: 應用程式在 Compute Engine 虛擬機器 (VM) 中產生每日報告。該虛擬機器位於 corp-iot-insights 專案中。您的團隊僅在 corp-aggregate-reports 專案中運行，並且需要儲存桶 corp-aggregate-reports-storage 中的每日匯出副本。您希望配置存取權限，以便在 corp-aggregate-reports-storage 儲存桶中提供來自虛擬機器的每日報告，並在遵循 Google 推薦的做法的同時使用盡可能少的步驟。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Move both projects under the same folder.
options.B: Grant the VM Service Account the role Storage Object Creator on corp-aggregate-reports-storage.
options.C: Create a Shared VPC network between both projects. Grant the VM Service Account the role Storage Object Creator on corp-iot-insights.
options.D: Make corp-aggregate-reports-storage public and create a folder with a pseudo-randomized suffix name. Share the folder with the IoT team.

question: You built an application on your development laptop that uses Google Cloud services. Your application uses Application Default Credentials for authentication and works fine on your development laptop. You want to migrate this application to a Compute Engine virtual machine (VM) and set up authentication using Google-recommended practices and minimal changes. What should you do?
question_translation: 您在使用 Google Cloud 服務的開發筆記型電腦上建立了一個應用程式。您的應用程式使用應用程式預設憑證進行身份驗證，並且在您的開發筆記型電腦上運作良好。您希望將此應用程式遷移到 Compute Engine 虛擬機器 (VM)，並使用 Google 建議的做法和最小的變更設定驗證。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Assign appropriate access for Google services to the service account used by the Compute Engine VM.
options.B: Create a service account with appropriate access for Google services, and configure the application to use this account.
options.C: Store credentials for service accounts with appropriate access for Google services in a config file, and deploy this config file with your application.
options.D: Store credentials for your user account with appropriate access for Google services in a config file, and deploy this config file with your application.

question: You need to create a Compute Engine instance in a new project that doesn't exist yet. What should you do?
question_translation: 您需要在尚不存在的新專案中建立 Compute Engine 實例。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Using the Cloud SDK, create a new project, enable the Compute Engine API in that project, and then create the instance specifying your new project.
options.B: Enable the Compute Engine API in the Cloud Console, use the Cloud SDK to create the instance, and then use the --project flag to specify a new project.
options.C: Using the Cloud SDK, create the new instance, and use the --project flag to specify the new project. Answer yes when prompted by Cloud SDK to enable the Compute Engine API.
options.D: Enable the Compute Engine API in the Cloud Console. Go to the Compute Engine section of the Console to create a new instance, and look for the 'Create In A New Project' option in the creation form.

question: Your company runs one batch process in an on-premises server that takes around 30 hours to complete. The task runs monthly, can be performed offline, and must be restarted if interrupted. You want to migrate this workload to the cloud while minimizing cost. What should you do?
question_translation: 您的公司在本地伺服器上運行一個批次流程，大約需要 30 小時才能完成。該任務每月運行一次，可以離線執行，如果中斷則必須重新啟動。您希望將此工作負載遷移到雲，同時最大限度地降低成本。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Migrate the workload to a Compute Engine Preemptible VM.
options.B: Migrate the workload to a Google Kubernetes Engine cluster with Preemptible nodes.
options.C: Migrate the workload to a Compute Engine VM. Start and stop the instance as needed.
options.D: Create an Instance Template with Preemptible VMs On. Create a Managed Instance Group from the template and adjust Target CPU Utilization. Migrate the workload.

question: You are developing a new application and are looking for a Jenkins installation to build and deploy your source code. You want to automate the installation as quickly and easily as possible. What should you do?
question_translation: 您正在開發一個新應用程序，並正在尋找 Jenkins 安裝來建置和部署您的原始程式碼。您希望盡可能快速、輕鬆地實現安裝自動化。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Deploy Jenkins through the Google Cloud Marketplace.
options.B: Create a new Compute Engine instance. Run the Jenkins executable.
options.C: Create a new Kubernetes Engine cluster. Create a deployment for the Jenkins image.
options.D: Create an instance template with the Jenkins executable. Create a managed instance group with this template.

question: You have downloaded and installed the gcloud command-line interface (CLI) and have authenticated with your Google Account. Most of your Compute Engine instances in your project run in the europe-west1-d zone. You want to avoid having to specify this zone with each CLI command when managing these instances. What should you do?
question_translation: 您已下載並安裝了 gcloud 命令列介面 (CLI)，並已使用您的 Google 帳戶進行了驗證。您專案中的大多數 Compute Engine 執行個體都在 europe-west1-d 區域中運作。您希望避免在管理這些實例時必須使用每個 CLI 命令指定此區域。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Set the europe-west1-d zone as the default zone using the gcloud config subcommand.
options.B: In the Settings page for Compute Engine under Default location, set the zone to europe-west1-d.
options.C: In the CLI installation directory, create a file called default.conf containing zone=europe-west1-d.
options.D: Create a Metadata entry on the Compute Engine page with key compute/zone and value europe-west1-d.

question: The core business of your company is to rent out construction equipment at large scale. All the equipment that is being rented out has been equipped with multiple sensors that send event information every few seconds. These signals can vary from engine status, distance traveled, fuel level, and more. Customers are billed based on the consumption monitored by these sensors. You expect high throughput—up to thousands of events per hour per device—and need to retrieve consistent data based on the time of the event. Storing and retrieving individual signals should be atomic. What should you do?
question_translation: 貴公司的核心業務是大規模租賃建築設備。所有出租的設備都配備了多個感測器，每隔幾秒鐘發送事件訊息。這些訊號可能因引擎狀態、行駛距離、燃油油位等而異。根據這些感測器監控的消耗量向客戶計費。您期望高吞吐量——每個設備每小時最多處理數千個事件，並且需要根據事件的時間檢索一致的資料。儲存和檢索單一訊號應該是原子的。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Create a file in Cloud Storage per device and append new data to that file.
options.B: Create a file in Cloud Filestore per device and append new data to that file.
options.C: Ingest the data into Datastore. Store data in an entity group based on the device.
options.D: Ingest the data into Cloud Bigtable. Create a row key based on the event timestamp.

question: You are asked to set up application performance monitoring on Google Cloud projects A, B, and C as a single pane of glass. You want to monitor CPU, memory, and disk. What should you do?
question_translation: 系統會要求您將 Google Cloud 專案 A、B 和 C 上的應用程式效能監控設定為單一管理平台。您想要監控 CPU、記憶體和磁碟。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Enable API and then share charts from project A, B, and C.
options.B: Enable API and then give the metrics.reader role to projects A, B, and C.
options.C: Enable API and then use default dashboards to view all projects in sequence.
options.D: Enable API, create a workspace under project A, and then add projects B and C.

question: You created several resources in multiple Google Cloud projects. All projects are linked to different billing accounts. To better estimate future charges, you want to have a single visual representation of all costs incurred. You want to include new cost data as soon as possible. What should you do?
question_translation: 您在多個 Google Cloud 專案中建立了多個資源。所有項目都連結到不同的計費帳戶。為了更好地估計未來的費用，您希望對所產生的所有成本有一個單一的視覺化表示。您希望盡快包含新的成本資料。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Configure Billing Data Export to BigQuery and visualize the data in Data Studio.
options.B: Visit the Cost Table page to get a CSV export and visualize it using Data Studio.
options.C: Fill all resources in the Pricing Calculator to get an estimate of the monthly cost.
options.D: Use the Reports view in the Cloud Billing Console to view the desired cost information.

question: Your company has workloads running on Compute Engine and on-premises. The Google Cloud Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) is connected to your WAN over a Virtual Private Network (VPN). You need to deploy a new Compute Engine instance and ensure that no public Internet traffic can be routed to it. What should you do?
question_translation: 您的公司有在 Compute Engine 和本地運作的工作負載。Google Cloud Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) 透過虛擬私人網路 (VPN) 連接到您的 WAN。您需要部署一個新的 Compute Engine 實例，並確保沒有公共互聯網流量可以路由到該實例。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Create the instance without a public IP address.
options.B: Create the instance with Private Google Access enabled.
options.C: Create a deny-all egress firewall rule on the VPC network.
options.D: Create a route on the VPC to route all traffic to the instance over the VPN tunnel.

question: Your team maintains the infrastructure for your organization. The current infrastructure requires changes. You need to share your proposed changes with the rest of the team. You want to follow Google's recommended best practices. What should you do?
question_translation: 您的團隊維護您組織的基礎設施。目前的基礎設施需要改變。您需要與團隊的其他成員分享您提議的變更。您希望遵循 Google 推薦的最佳做法。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Use Deployment Manager templates to describe the proposed changes and store them in a Cloud Storage bucket.
options.B: Use Deployment Manager templates to describe the proposed changes and store them in Cloud Source Repositories.
options.C: Apply the changes in a development environment, run gcloud compute instances list, and then save the output in a shared Storage bucket.
options.D: Apply the changes in a development environment, run gcloud compute instances list, and then save the output in Cloud Source Repositories.

question: You have a Compute Engine instance hosting an application used between 9 AM and 6 PM on weekdays. You want to back up this instance daily for disaster recovery purposes. You want to keep the backups for 30 days. You want the Google-recommended solution with the least management overhead and the least number of services. What should you do?
question_translation: 您有一個 Compute Engine 執行個體託管在工作日上午 9 點到下午 6 點之間使用的應用程式。您希望每天備份此實例以進行災難復原。您希望將備份保留 30 天。您需要 Google 建議的解決方案，管理開銷最少，服務數量最少。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Update your instances' metadata to add the following value: snapshot-schedule: 0 1 * * * Update your instances' metadata to add the following value: snapshot-retention: 30
options.B: In the Cloud Console, go to the Compute Engine Disks page and select your instance's disk. In the Snapshot Schedule section, select Create Schedule and configure the following parameters: Schedule frequency: Daily Start time: 1:00 AM - 2:00 AM Auto-delete snapshots after: 30 days
options.C: Create a Cloud Function that creates a snapshot of your instance's disk. Create a Cloud Function that deletes snapshots that are older than 30 days. Use Cloud Scheduler to trigger both Cloud Functions daily at 1:00 AM.
options.D: Create a bash script in the instance that copies the content of the disk to Cloud Storage. Create a bash script in the instance that deletes data older than 30 days in the backup Cloud Storage bucket. Configure the instance's crontab to execute these scripts daily at 1:00 AM.

question: Your existing application running in Google Kubernetes Engine (GKE) consists of multiple pods running on four GKE n1-standard-2 nodes. You need to deploy additional pods requiring n2-highmem-16 nodes without any downtime. What should you do?
question_translation: 在 Google Kubernetes Engine (GKE) 中運行的現有應用程式由在四個 GKE n1-standard-2 節點上運行的多個 Pod 組成。您需要在不停機的情況下部署需要 n2-highmem-16 個節點的額外 Pod。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Use gcloud container clusters upgrade. Deploy the new services.
options.B: Create a new NodePool and specify machine type n2-highmem-16 new pods.
options.C: Create a new cluster with n2-highmem-16. Deploy the nodes. Redeploy the pods and delete the old cluster.
options.D: Create a new cluster with both n1-standard-2. Redeploy the pods and delete the old cluster.

question: You have an application that uses Cloud Spanner as a database backend to keep current state information about users. Cloud Bigtable logs all events triggered by users. You export Cloud Spanner data to Cloud Storage during daily backups. One of your analysts asks you to join data from Cloud Spanner and Cloud Bigtable for specific users. You want to complete this ad hoc request as efficiently as possible. What should you do?
question_translation: 您有一個使用 Cloud Spanner 作為資料庫後端的應用程式來保存有關使用者的當前狀態資訊。Cloud Bigtable 記錄使用者觸發的所有事件。您可以在日常備份期間將 Cloud Spanner 資料匯出至 Cloud Storage。您的一位分析師要求您合併來自 Cloud Spanner 和 Cloud Bigtable 的數據，針對特定使用者。您希望盡可能有效率地完成此臨時請求。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Create a Dataflow job that copies data from Cloud Bigtable and Cloud Storage for specific users.
options.B: Create a Dataflow job that copies data from Cloud Bigtable and Cloud Spanner for specific users.
options.C: Create a Cloud Dataproc cluster that runs a Spark job to extract data from Cloud Bigtable and Cloud Storage for specific users.
options.D: Create two separate BigQuery external tables on Cloud Storage and Cloud Bigtable. Use the BigQuery console to join these tables through user fields, and apply appropriate filters.

question: You are hosting an application from Compute Engine virtual machines (VMs) in us-central1-a. You want to adjust your design to support the failure of a single Compute Engine zone, eliminate downtime, and minimize cost. What should you do?
question_translation: 您正在 us-central1-a 中託管來自 Compute Engine 虛擬機器 (VM) 的應用程式。您想要調整您的設計以支援單一 Compute Engine 區域故障，消除停機時間並最大限度地降低成本。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Create Compute Engine resources in us-central1-b. Balance the load across both us-central1-a and us-central1-b.
options.B: Create a Managed Instance Group and specify us-central1-a as the zone. Configure the Health Check with a short Health Interval.
options.C: Create an HTTP(S) Load Balancer. Create one or more global forwarding rules to direct traffic to your VMs.
options.D: Perform regular backups of your application. Create a Cloud Monitoring Alert and be notified if your application becomes unavailable. Restore from backups when notified.

question: A colleague handed over a Google Cloud Platform project for you to maintain. As part of a security checkup, you want to review who has been granted the Project Owner role. What should you do?
question_translation: 一位同事將一個 Google Cloud Platform 專案交給您來維護。作為安全檢查的一部分，您想要查看誰已被授予該專案的所有者角色。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: In the console, validate which SSH keys have been stored as project-wide keys.
options.B: Navigate to Identity-Aware Proxy and check the permissions for these resources.
options.C: Enable Audit Logs on the IAM & admin page for all resources, and validate the results.
options.D: Use the command gcloud projects get-iam-policy to view the current role assignments.

question: You are running multiple VPC-native Google Kubernetes Engine clusters in the same subnet. The IPs available for the nodes are exhausted, and you want to ensure that the clusters can grow in nodes when needed. What should you do?
question_translation: 您正在同一子網路中執行多個 VPC 原生 Google Kubernetes Engine 叢集。節點可用的 IP 已耗盡，並且您希望確保叢集可以在需要時在節點中成長。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Create a new subnet in the same region as the subnet being used.
options.B: Add an alias IP range to the subnet used by the GKE clusters.
options.C: Create a new VPC and set up VPC peering with the existing VPC.
options.D: Expand the CIDR range of the relevant subnet for the cluster.

question: You have a batch workload that runs every night and uses a large number of virtual machines (VMs). It is fault-tolerant and can tolerate some of the VMs being terminated. The current cost of VMs is too high. What should you do?
question_translation: 您有一個每天晚上運行並使用大量虛擬機器 (VM) 的批次工作負載。它具有容錯能力，可以容忍某些虛擬機器被終止。目前虛擬機器的成本太高。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Run a test using simulated maintenance events. If the test is successful, use preemptible N1 Standard VMs when running future jobs.
options.B: Run a test using simulated maintenance events. If the test is successful, use N1 Standard VMs when running future jobs.
options.C: Run a test using a managed instance group. If the test is successful, use N1 Standard VMs in the managed instance group when running future jobs.
options.D: Run a test using N1 Standard VMs instead of N2. If the test is successful, use N1 Standard VMs when running future jobs.

question: You are working with a user to set up an application in a new VPC behind a firewall. The user is concerned about data egress. You want to configure the fewest open egress ports. What should you do?
question_translation: 您正在與用戶合作在防火牆後面的新 VPC 中設定應用程式。用戶關心資料流出。您想要配置最少的開放出口連接埠。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Set up a low-priority (65534) rule that blocks all egress and a high-priority rule (1000) that allows only the appropriate ports.
options.B: Set up a high-priority (1000) rule that pairs both ingress and egress ports.
options.C: Set up a high-priority (1000) rule that blocks all egress and a low-priority (65534) rule that allows only the appropriate ports.
options.D: Set up a high-priority (1000) rule to allow the appropriate ports.

question: Your company runs its Linux workloads on Compute Engine instances. Your company will be working with a new operations partner that does not use Google Accounts. You need to grant access to the instances to your operations partner so they can maintain the installed tooling. What should you do?
question_translation: 您的公司在 Compute Engine 執行個體上執行其 Linux 工作負載。貴公司將與不使用 Google 帳戶的新營運合作夥伴合作。您需要向營運合作夥伴授予對實例的存取權限，以便他們可以維護已安裝的工具。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Enable Cloud IAP for the Compute Engine instances, and add the operations partner as a Cloud IAP Tunnel User.
options.B: Tag all the instances with the same network tag. Create a firewall rule in the VPC to grant TCP access on port 22 for traffic from the operations partner to instances with the network tag.
options.C: Set up Cloud VPN between your Google Cloud VPC and the internal network of the operations partner.
options.D: Ask the operations partner to generate SSH key pairs, and add the public keys to the VM instances.

question: You have created a code snippet that should be triggered whenever a new file is uploaded to a Cloud Storage bucket. You want to deploy this code snippet. What should you do?
question_translation: 您已建立了一個程式碼片段，只要將新檔案上傳到 Cloud Storage 儲存桶，就會觸發該程式碼片段。您想要部署此程式碼片段。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Use App Engine and configure Cloud Scheduler to trigger the application using Pub/Sub.
options.B: Use Cloud Functions and configure the bucket as a trigger resource.
options.C: Use Google Kubernetes Engine and configure a CronJob to trigger the application using Pub/Sub.
options.D: Use Dataflow as a batch job, and configure the bucket as a data source.

question: You have been asked to set up Object Lifecycle Management for objects stored in storage buckets. The objects are written once and accessed frequently for 30 days. After 30 days, the objects are not read again unless there is a special need. The objects should be kept for three years, and you need to minimize cost. What should you do?
question_translation: 系統要求您為儲存桶中儲存的物件設定物件生命週期管理。這些物件寫入一次並在 30 天內頻繁存取。30 天後，除非有特殊需要，否則不再讀取這些物件。這些物品應保存三年，並且您需要最大限度地降低成本。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Set up a policy that uses Nearline storage for 30 days and then moves to Archive storage for three years.
options.B: Set up a policy that uses Standard storage for 30 days and then moves to Archive storage for three years.
options.C: Set up a policy that uses Nearline storage for 30 days, then moves the Coldline for one year, and then moves to Archive storage for two years.
options.D: Set up a policy that uses Standard storage for 30 days, then moves to Coldline for one year, and then moves to Archive storage for two years.

question: You are storing sensitive information in a Cloud Storage bucket. For legal reasons, you need to be able to record all requests that read any of the stored data. You want to make sure you comply with these requirements. What should you do?
question_translation: 您正在將敏感資訊儲存在 Cloud Storage 儲存分區中。出於法律原因，您需要能夠記錄讀取任何儲存資料的所有請求。您需要確保遵守這些要求。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Enable the Identity Aware Proxy API on the project.
options.B: Scan the bucket using the Data Loss Prevention API.
options.C: Allow only a single Service Account access to read the data.
options.D: Enable Data Access audit logs for the Cloud Storage API.

question: You are the team lead of a group of 10 developers. You provided each developer with an individual Google Cloud Project that they can use as their personal sandbox to experiment with different Google Cloud solutions. You want to be notified if any of the developers are spending above $500 per month on their sandbox environment. What should you do?
question_translation: 您是由 10 位開發人員組成的團隊的團隊負責人。您為每位開發者提供了一個單獨的 Google Cloud 項目，他們可以將其用作個人沙盒來試驗不同的 Google Cloud 解決方案。如果任何開發人員在其沙盒環境上每月花費超過 500 美元，您希望收到通知。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Create a single budget for all projects and configure budget alerts on this budget.
options.B: Create a separate billing account per sandbox project and enable BigQuery billing exports. Create a Data Studio dashboard to plot the spending per billing account.
options.C: Create a budget per project and configure budget alerts on all of these budgets.
options.D: Create a single billing account for all sandbox projects and enable BigQuery billing exports. Create a Data Studio dashboard to plot the spending per project.

question: You are deploying a production application on Compute Engine. You want to prevent anyone from accidentally destroying the instance by clicking the wrong button. What should you do?
question_translation: 您正在 Compute Engine 上部署生產應用程式。您希望防止任何人透過點擊錯誤的按鈕意外破壞實例。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Disable the flag 'Delete boot disk when instance is deleted'.
options.B: Enable delete protection on the instance.
options.C: Disable Automatic restart on the instance.
options.D: Enable Preemptibility on the instance.

question: Your company uses a large number of Google Cloud services centralized in a single project. All teams have specific projects for testing and development. The DevOps team needs access to all of the production services in order to perform their job. You want to prevent Google Cloud product changes from broadening their permissions in the future. You want to follow Google-recommended practices. What should you do?
question_translation: 您的公司使用大量集中在單一專案中的 Google Cloud 服務。所有團隊都有特定的測試和開發專案。DevOps 團隊需要存取所有生產服務才能執行其工作。您希望防止 Google Cloud 產品在未來發生變化而擴大其權限。您需要遵循 Google 推薦的做法。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Grant all members of the DevOps team the role of Project Editor on the organization level.
options.B: Grant all members of the DevOps team the role of Project Editor on the production project.
options.C: Create a custom role that combines the required permissions. Grant the DevOps team the custom role on the production project.
options.D: Create a custom role that combines the required permissions. Grant the DevOps team the custom role on the organization level.

question:
You are building an application that processes data files uploaded from thousands of suppliers. Your primary goals for the application are data security and the expiration of aged data. You need to design the application to:

* Restrict access so that suppliers can access only their own data.
* Give suppliers write access to data only for 30 minutes.
* Delete data that is over 45 days old.

You have a very short development cycle, and you need to make sure that the application requires minimal maintenance. Which two strategies should you use? (Choose two.)
question_translation:
您正在建立一個應用程式來處理從數千個供應商上傳的資料檔案。您的應用程式的主要目標是資料安全和老化資料的過期。您需要將應用程式設計為：

* 限制訪問，使供應商只能存取自己的資料。
* 僅授予供應商 30 分鐘的資料寫入權限。
* 刪除超過 45 天的資料。

您的開發週期非常短，並且需要確保應用程式需要最少的維護。您應該使用哪兩種策略？（選兩個。）

options.A: Build a lifecycle policy to delete Cloud Storage objects after 45 days.
options.B: Use signed URLs to allow suppliers limited-time access to store their objects.
options.C: Set up an SFTP server for your application, and create a separate user for each supplier.
options.D: Build a Cloud function that triggers a timer of 45 days to delete objects that have expired.
options.E: Develop a script that loops through all Cloud Storage buckets and deletes any buckets that are older than 45 days.

question: Your company wants to standardize the creation and management of multiple Google Cloud resources using Infrastructure as Code. You want to minimize the amount of repetitive code needed to manage the environment. What should you do?
question_translation: 您的公司希望使用基礎架構即程式碼來標準化多個 Google Cloud 資源的建立和管理。您希望最大限度地減少管理環境所需的重複程式碼量。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Develop templates for the environment using Cloud Deployment Manager.
options.B: Use curl in a terminal to send a REST request to the relevant Google API for each individual resource.
options.C: Use the Cloud Console interface to provision and manage all related resources.
options.D: Create a bash script that contains all requirement steps as gcloud commands.

question: You are performing a monthly security check of your Google Cloud environment and want to know who has access to view data stored in your Google Cloud Project. What should you do?
question_translation: 您每月對您的 Google Cloud 環境進行一次安全檢查，並想知道誰有權查看您的 Google Cloud 中儲存的數據專案。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Enable Audit Logs for all APIs that are related to data storage.
options.B: Review the IAM permissions for any role that allows for data access.
options.C: Review the Identity-Aware Proxy settings for each resource.
options.D: Create a Data Loss Prevention job.

question: Your company has embraced a hybrid cloud strategy where some of the applications are deployed on Google Cloud. A Virtual Private Network (VPN) tunnel connects your Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) in Google Cloud with your company's on-premises network. Multiple applications in Google Cloud need to connect to an on-premises database server, and you want to avoid having to change the IP configuration in all of your applications when the IP of the database changes. What should you do?
question_translation: 您的公司已採用混合雲策略，其中一些應用程式部署在 Google Cloud 上。虛擬私人網路 (VPN) 隧道將 Google Cloud 中的虛擬私有雲 (VPC) 與您公司的本地網路連接起來。GCP 中的多個應用程式需要連接到本機資料庫伺服器，並且您希望避免在資料庫的 IP 變更時變更所有應用程式中的 IP 設定。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Configure Cloud NAT for all subnets of your VPC to be used when egressing from the VM instances.
options.B: Create a private zone on Cloud DNS, and configure the applications with the DNS name.
options.C: Configure the IP of the database as custom metadata for each instance, and query the metadata server.
options.D: Query the Compute Engine internal DNS from the applications to retrieve the IP of the database.

question: You have developed a containerized web application that will serve internal colleagues during business hours. You want to ensure that no costs are incurred outside of the hours the application is used. You have just created a new Google Cloud project and want to deploy the application. What should you do?
question_translation: 您開發了一個容器化 Web 應用程序，它將在工作時間為內部同事提供服務。您希望確保在使用應用程式的時間之外不會產生任何費用。您剛剛建立了一個新的 Google Cloud 專案並想要部署該應用程式。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Deploy the container on Cloud Run for Anthos, and set the minimum number of instances to zero.
options.B: Deploy the container on Cloud Run (fully managed), and set the minimum number of instances to zero.
options.C: Deploy the container on App Engine flexible environment with autoscaling, and set the value min_instances to zero in the app.yaml.
options.D: Deploy the container on App Engine flexible environment with manual scaling, and set the value instances to zero in the app.yaml.

question: You have experimented with Google Cloud using your own credit card and expensed the costs to your company. Your company wants to streamline the billing process and charge the costs of your projects to their monthly invoice. What should you do?
question_translation: 您已使用自己的信用卡嘗試使用 Google Cloud，並將費用支付給您的公司。您的公司希望簡化計費流程並將專案成本計入每月發票中。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Grant the financial team the IAM role of 'Billing Account User' on the billing account linked to your credit card.
options.B: Set up BigQuery billing export and grant your financial department IAM access to query the data.
options.C: Create a ticket with Google Billing Support to ask them to send the invoice to your company.
options.D: Change the billing account of your projects to the billing account of your company.

question: You are running a data warehouse on BigQuery. A partner company is offering a recommendation engine based on the data in your data warehouse. The partner company is also running their application on Google Cloud. They manage the resources in their own project, but they need access to the BigQuery dataset in your project. You want to provide the partner company with access to the dataset. What should you do?
question_translation: 您正在 BigQuery 上執行資料倉儲。合作夥伴公司正在根據您的資料倉儲中的資料提供推薦引擎。合作夥伴公司也在 Google Cloud 上運行他們的應用程式。他們管理自己專案中的資源，但需要存取您專案中的 BigQuery 資料集。您希望向合作夥伴公司提供資料集的存取權限。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Create a Service Account in your own project, and grant this Service Account access to BigQuery in your project.
options.B: Create a Service Account in your own project, and ask the partner to grant this Service Account access to BigQuery in their project.
options.C: Ask the partner to create a Service Account in their project, and have them give the Service Account access to BigQuery in their project.
options.D: Ask the partner to create a Service Account in their project, and grant their Service Account access to the BigQuery dataset in your project.

question: Your web application has been running successfully on Cloud Run for Anthos. You want to evaluate an updated version of the application with a specific percentage of your production users (canary deployment). What should you do?
question_translation: 您的 Web 應用程式已在 Cloud Run for Anthos 上成功運作。您想要使用特定百分比的生產用戶來評估應用程式的更新版本（金絲雀部署）。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Create a new service with the new version of the application. Split traffic between this version and the version that is currently running.
options.B: Create a new revision with the new version of the application. Split traffic between this version and the version that is currently running.
options.C: Create a new service with the new version of the application. Add an HTTP Load Balancer in front of both services.
options.D: Create a new revision with the new version of the application. Add an HTTP Load Balancer in front of both revisions.

question: Your company developed a mobile game that is deployed on Google Cloud. Gamers are connecting to the game with their personal phones over the Internet. The game sends UDP packets to update the servers about the gamers' actions while they are playing in multiplayer mode. Your game backend can scale over multiple virtual machines (VMs), and you want to expose the VMs over a single IP address. What should you do?
question_translation: 貴公司開發了一款部署在 Google Cloud 上的手機遊戲。遊戲玩家透過網路使用個人手機連接遊戲。遊戲發送 UDP 封包來更新伺服器有關玩家在多人模式下玩遊戲時的操作。您的遊戲後端可以擴展到多個虛擬機器 (VM)，並且您希望透過單一 IP 位址公開 VM。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Configure an SSL Proxy load balancer in front of the application servers.
options.B: Configure an Internal UDP load balancer in front of the application servers.
options.C: Configure an External HTTP(S) load balancer in front of the application servers.
options.D: Configure an External Network load balancer in front of the application servers.

question: You are working for a hospital that stores its medical images in an on-premises data room. The hospital wants to use Cloud Storage for archival storage of these images. The hospital wants an automated process to upload any new medical images to Cloud Storage. You need to design and implement a solution. What should you do?
question_translation: 您在醫院工作，該醫院將其醫療影像儲存在本地資料室中。醫院希望使用雲端儲存來存檔儲存這些影像。醫院希望透過自動化流程將任何新的醫學影像上傳到雲端儲存。您需要設計並實施一個解決方案。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Create a Pub/Sub topic, and enable a Cloud Storage trigger for the Pub/Sub topic. Create an application that sends all medical images to the Pub/Sub topic.
options.B: Deploy a Dataflow job from the batch template, 'Datastore to Cloud Storage'. Schedule the batch job on the desired interval.
options.C: Create a script that uses the gsutil command-line interface to synchronize the on-premises storage with Cloud Storage. Schedule the script as a cron job.
options.D: In the Cloud Console, go to Cloud Storage. Upload the relevant images to the appropriate bucket.

question: Your auditor wants to view your organization's use of data in Google Cloud. The auditor is most interested in auditing who accessed data in Cloud Storage buckets. You need to help the auditor access the data they need. What should you do?
question_translation: 您的審核員想要查看您的組織對 Google Cloud 中資料的使用情況。審核員最感興趣的是審核誰存取了 Cloud Storage 儲存桶中的資料。您需要幫助審核員存取他們需要的資料。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Turn on Data Access Logs for the buckets they want to audit, and then build a query in the log viewer that filters on Cloud Storage.
options.B: Assign the appropriate permissions, and then create a Data Studio report on Admin Activity Audit Logs.
options.C: Assign the appropriate permissions, and then use Cloud Monitoring to review metrics.
options.D: Use the export logs API to provide the Admin Activity Audit Logs in the format they want.

question: You received a JSON file that contained a private key of a Service Account in order to get access to several resources in a Google Cloud project. You downloaded and installed the Cloud SDK and want to use this private key for authentication and authorization when performing gcloud commands. What should you do?
question_translation: 您收到了一個包含服務帳號私鑰的 JSON 文件，以便存取 Google Cloud 專案中的多個資源。您下載並安裝了 Cloud SDK，並希望在執行 gcloud 命令時使用此私鑰進行身份驗證和授權。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Use the command 'gcloud auth login' and point it to the private key.
options.B: Use the command 'gcloud auth activate-service-account' and point it to the private key.
options.C: Place the private key file in the installation directory of the Cloud SDK and rename it to 'credentials.json'.
options.D: Place the private key file in your home directory and rename it to 'GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS'.

question: You are working with a Cloud SQL MySQL database at your company. You need to retain a month-end copy of the database for three years for audit purposes. What should you do?
question_translation: 您正在公司使用 Cloud SQL MySQL 資料庫。您需要將資料庫的月末副本保留三年以供審計之用。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Set up an export job for the first of the month. Write the export file to an Archive class Cloud Storage bucket.
options.B: Save the automatic first-of-the-month backup for three years. Store the backup file in an Archive class Cloud Storage bucket.
options.C: Set up an on-demand backup for the first of the month. Write the backup to an Archive class Cloud Storage bucket.
options.D: Convert the automatic first-of-the-month backup to an export file. Write the export file to a Coldline class Cloud Storage bucket.

question: You are monitoring an application and receive user feedback that a specific error is spiking. You notice that the error is caused by a Service Account having insufficient permissions. You are able to solve the problem but want to be notified if the problem recurs. What should you do?
question_translation: 您正在監視應用程式並收到用戶回饋，表明特定錯誤正在激增。您注意到該錯誤是由服務帳戶權限不足所引起的。您能夠解決問題，但希望在問題再次出現時收到通知。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: In the Log Viewer, filter the logs on severity 'Error' and the name of the Service Account.
options.B: Create a sink to BigQuery to export all the logs. Create a Data Studio dashboard on the exported logs.
options.C: Create a custom log-based metric for the specific error to be used in an Alerting Policy.
options.D: Grant Project Owner access to the Service Account.

question: You are developing a financial trading application that will be used globally. Data is stored and queried using a relational structure, and clients from all over the world should get the exact identical state of the data. The application will be deployed in multiple regions to provide the lowest latency to end users. You need to select a storage option for the application data while minimizing latency. What should you do?
question_translation: 您正在開發一個將在全球範圍內使用的金融交易應用程式。資料使用關係結構進行儲存和查詢，來自世界各地的客戶端應該獲得完全相同的資料狀態。該應用程式將部署在多個區域，以便為最終用戶提供最低的延遲。您需要為應用程式資料選擇一個儲存選項，同時最大限度地減少延遲。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Use Cloud Bigtable for data storage.
options.B: Use Cloud SQL for data storage.
options.C: Use Cloud Spanner for data storage.
options.D: Use Firestore for data storage.

question: You are about to deploy a new Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) system on Google Cloud. The application holds the full database in-memory for fast data access, and you need to configure the most appropriate resources on Google Cloud for this application. What should you do?
question_translation: 您即將在 Google Cloud 上部署新的企業資源規劃 (ERP) 系統。該應用程式在記憶體中保存完整的資料庫，以便快速存取數據，您需要在 GCP 上為此應用程式配置最合適的資源。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Provision preemptible Compute Engine instances.
options.B: Provision Compute Engine instances with GPUs attached.
options.C: Provision Compute Engine instances with local SSDs attached.
options.D: Provision Compute Engine instances with M1 machine type.

question: You have developed an application that consists of multiple microservices, with each microservice packaged in its own Docker container image. You want to deploy the entire application on Google Kubernetes Engine so that each microservice can be scaled individually. What should you do?
question_translation: 您開發了一個由多個微服務組成的應用程序，每個微服務都打包在自己的 Docker 容器映像中。您希望將整個應用程式部署在 Google Kubernetes Engine 上，以便每個微服務都可以單獨擴展。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Create and deploy a Custom Resource Definition per microservice.
options.B: Create and deploy a Docker Compose file.
options.C: Create and deploy a Job per microservice.
options.D: Create and deploy a Deployment per microservice.

question: You will have several applications running on different Compute Engine instances in the same project. You want to specify at a more granular level the service account each instance uses when calling Google Cloud APIs. What should you do?
question_translation: 您將在同一專案中的不同 Compute Engine 執行個體上執行多個應用程式。您希望更精細地指定每個執行個體在呼叫 Google Cloud API 時所使用的服務帳號。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: When creating the instances, specify a Service Account for each instance.
options.B: When creating the instances, assign the name of each Service Account as instance metadata.
options.C: After starting the instances, use gcloud compute instances update to specify a Service Account for each instance.
options.D: After starting the instances, use gcloud compute instances update to assign the name of the relevant Service Account as instance metadata.

question: You are creating an application that will run on Google Kubernetes Engine. You have identified MongoDB as the most suitable database system for your application and want to deploy a managed MongoDB environment that provides a support SLA. What should you do?
question_translation: 您正在建立一個將在 Google Kubernetes Engine 上執行的應用程式。您已確定 MongoDB 是最適合您的應用程式的資料庫系統，並希望部署一個提供支援 SLA 的託管 MongoDB 環境。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Create a Cloud Bigtable cluster, and use the HBase API.
options.B: Deploy MongoDB Atlas from the Google Cloud Marketplace.
options.C: Download a MongoDB installation package, and run it on Compute Engine instances.
options.D: Download a MongoDB installation package, and run it on a Managed Instance Group.

question: You are managing a project for the Business Intelligence (BI) department in your company. A data pipeline ingests data into BigQuery via streaming. You want the users in the BI department to be able to run the custom SQL queries against the latest data in BigQuery. What should you do?
question_translation: 您正在管理公司商業智慧 (BI) 部門的一個專案。資料管道透過串流傳輸將資料提取到 BigQuery 中。您希望 BI 部門的使用者能夠針對 BigQuery 中的最新資料執行自訂 SQL 查詢。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Create a Data Studio dashboard that uses the related BigQuery tables as a source and give the BI team view access to the Data Studio dashboard.
options.B: Create a Service Account for the BI team and distribute a new private key to each member of the BI team.
options.C: Use Cloud Scheduler to schedule a batch Dataflow job to copy the data from BigQuery to the BI team's internal data warehouse.
options.D: Assign the IAM role of BigQuery User to a Google Group that contains the members of the BI team.

question: Your company is moving its entire workload to Compute Engine. Some servers should be accessible through the Internet, and other servers should only be accessible over the internal network. All servers need to be able to talk to each other over specific ports and protocols. The current on-premises network relies on a demilitarized zone (DMZ) for the public servers and a Local Area Network (LAN) for the private servers. You need to design the networking infrastructure on Google Cloud to match these requirements. What should you do?
question_translation: 您的公司正在將其全部工作負載轉移到 Compute Engine。一些伺服器應該可以透過 Internet 訪問，而其他伺服器應該只能透過內部網路存取。所有伺服器都需要能夠透過特定連接埠和協定相互通訊。目前的本地網路依賴公共伺服器的非軍事區 (DMZ) 和專用伺服器的區域網路 (LAN)。您需要設計網路基礎設施 Google Cloud 以滿足這些要求。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Create a single VPC with a subnet for the DMZ and a subnet for the LAN. Set up firewall rules to open up relevant traffic between the DMZ and the LAN subnets, and another firewall rule to allow public ingress traffic for the DMZ.
options.B: Create a single VPC with a subnet for the DMZ and a subnet for the LAN. Set up firewall rules to open up relevant traffic between the DMZ and the LAN subnets, and another firewall rule to allow public egress traffic for the DMZ.
options.C: Create a VPC with a subnet for the DMZ and another VPC with a subnet for the LAN. Set up firewall rules to open up relevant traffic between the DMZ and the LAN subnets, and another firewall rule to allow public ingress traffic for the DMZ.
options.D: Create a VPC with a subnet for the DMZ and another VPC with a subnet for the LAN. Set up firewall rules to open up relevant traffic between the DMZ and the LAN subnets, and another firewall rule to allow public egress traffic for the DMZ.

question: You have just created a new project which will be used to deploy a globally distributed application. You will use Cloud Spanner for data storage. You want to create a Cloud Spanner instance. You want to perform the first step in preparation of creating the instance. What should you do?
question_translation: 您剛剛建立了一個新項目，它將用於部署全球分散式應用程式。您將使用 Cloud Spanner 進行資料儲存。您想要建立一個 Cloud Spanner 實例。您想要執行準備建立實例的第一步。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Enable the Cloud Spanner API.
options.B: Configure your Cloud Spanner instance to be multi-regional.
options.C: Create a new VPC network with subnetworks in all desired regions.
options.D: Grant yourself the IAM role of Cloud Spanner Admin.

question: You have created a new project in Google Cloud through the gcloud command-line interface (CLI) and linked a billing account. You need to create a new Compute Engine instance using the CLI. You need to perform the prerequisite steps. What should you do?
question_translation: 您已透過 gcloud 命令列介面 (CLI) 在 Google Cloud 中建立了一個新項目並關聯了一個結算帳號。您需要建立一個新的 Compute Engine 執行個體使用 CLI。您需要執行先決條件步驟。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Create a Cloud Monitoring Workspace.
options.B: Create a VPC network in the project.
options.C: Enable the compute googleapis.com API.
options.D: Grant yourself the IAM role of Compute Admin.

question: Your company has developed a new application that consists of multiple microservices. You want to deploy the application to Google Kubernetes Engine (GKE), and you want to ensure that the cluster can scale as more applications are deployed in the future. You want to avoid manual intervention when each new application is deployed. What should you do?
question_translation: 您的公司開發了一個由多個微服務組成的新應用程式。您希望將應用程式部署到 Google Kubernetes Engine (GKE)，並且希望確保叢集能夠隨著未來部署更多應用程式而擴展。您希望在部署每個新應用程式時避免手動幹預。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Deploy the application on GKE, and add a HorizontalPodAutoscaler to the deployment.
options.B: Deploy the application on GKE, and add a VerticalPodAutoscaler to the deployment.
options.C: Create a GKE cluster with autoscaling enabled on the node pool. Set a minimum and maximum for the size of the node pool.
options.D: Create a separate node pool for each application, and deploy each application to its dedicated node pool.

question: You need to manage a third-party application that will run on a Compute Engine instance. Other Compute Engine instances are already running with default configuration. Application installation files are hosted on Cloud Storage. You need to access these files from the new instance without allowing other virtual machines (VMs) to access these files. What should you do?
question_translation: 您需要管理將在 Compute Engine 執行個體上執行的第三方應用程式。其他 Compute Engine 實例已使用預設配置運行。應用程式安裝檔案託管在 Cloud Storage 上。您需要從新執行個體存取這些文件，而不允許其他虛擬機器 (VM) 存取這些文件。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Create the instance with the default Compute Engine service account. Grant the service account permissions on Cloud Storage.
options.B: Create the instance with the default Compute Engine service account. Add metadata to the objects on Cloud Storage that matches the metadata on the new instance.
options.C: Create a new service account and assign this service account to the new instance. Grant the service account permissions on Cloud Storage.
options.D: Create a new service account and assign this service account to the new instance. Add metadata to the objects on Cloud Storage that matches the metadata on the new instance.

question: You need to configure optimal data storage for files stored in Cloud Storage for minimal cost. The files are used in a mission-critical analytics pipeline that is used continually. The users are in Boston, MA (United States). What should you do?
question_translation: 您需要以最低的成本為 Cloud Storage 中儲存的檔案配置最佳的資料儲存。這些文件用於持續使用的關鍵任務分析管道。使用者位於麻薩諸塞州波士頓（美國）。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Configure regional storage for the region closest to the users. Configure a Nearline storage class.
options.B: Configure regional storage for the region closest to the users. Configure a Standard storage class.
options.C: Configure dual-regional storage for the dual region closest to the users. Configure a Nearline storage class.
options.D: Configure dual-regional storage for the dual region closest to the users. Configure a Standard storage class.

question: You are developing a new web application that will be deployed on Google Cloud Platform. As part of your release cycle, you want to test updates to your application on a small portion of real user traffic. The majority of the users should still be directed towards a stable version of your application. What should you do?
question_translation: 您正在開發一個新的 Web 應用程序，該應用程式將部署在 Google Cloud Platform 上。作為發布週期的一部分，您希望在一小部分真實用戶流量上測試應用程式的更新。大多數用戶仍應轉向應用程式的穩定版本。你該怎麼辦？

options.A: Deploy the application on App Engine. For each update, create a new version of the same service. Configure traffic splitting to send a small percentage of traffic to the new version.
options.B: Deploy the application on App Engine. For each update, create a new service. Configure traffic splitting to send a small percentage of traffic to the new service.
options.C: Deploy the application on Kubernetes Engine. For a new release, update the deployment to use the new version.
options.D: Deploy the application on Kubernetes Engine. For a new release, create a new deployment for the new version. Update the service to use the new deployment.

question: You need to add a group of new users to Cloud Identity. Some of the users already have existing Google accounts. You want to follow one of Google's recommended practices and avoid conflicting accounts. What should you do?
